Trish had always been a happy girl. She had a normal up bringing as a only child. She enjoyed her high school years and had recently left the nest to go off to college. While Trish attended high school she had been pin thin. She didn't play sports, but through nature she had been able to stay extremely thin. This ability made the girls in her social group fairly jealous, especially because Trish would pack it away when it came to food right in front of them. Trish would eat two helpings of pizza, an order of french fries, and two giant cookies nearly every day for lunch at the cafe. Her other friends would either be eating diet food or a normal portioned meal from the school. Some of the girls had problems with their weight, but Trish failed to notice their struggle to diet. She did notice how ever that no matter how much she ate she didn't gain an ounce. As time went on Trish took more and more advantage of her natural gift. She had sweets all the time and had seconds and thirds on meals if she really liked them. She enjoyed eating, especially tasty food.

This was all in Trish's past now. She had just arrived to college where she was going to spend the next four years on her own.

111.content:
Over time Trish had sort of started a love affair with food. She could eat all she wanted and not gain an ounce, so why not enjoy it. Where she was off to college she had an unlimited access to freshly cooked food. This took most of the work that stopped Trish to chowing 24/7 at home away. Free pizza any time of day, fresh burgers and fries all the time, breakfast, lunch, and dinner served course after course in unlimited quantities. Trish enjoyed this new found food source and took full advantage of it.

After weeks at school, stuffing her face when ever she wanted, Trish had started to form a routine. She had made lots of friends, enough to replace her high school ones. All of her girl friends took notice of how much she ate. Some thought she was doomed to gain the freshman 15, like they had started to fear for them selves. Some of her other friends were just jealous because they were on such restrictive diets. None of it phased Trish. But after a these few short weeks at college, something changed. Something deep down inside Trish was changing. She was starting to show her age, and her metabolism was starting to slow. The natural wonder that had kept her so thin during high school was now on it's last legs. Obviously Trish didn't know this and continued to eat as much as she pleased.

After a little over a month had passed Trish's body started to show the results of a past its prime metabolism. A layer of fat started to fill in around her stomach. Trish was not one to look for these subtle changes didn't even notice. But as the weeks went on and her belly got bigger it was pretty hard not to notice. At first her friends all noticed her slight gain. They all smirked as her eating started to catch up with her. Oblivious Trish was none the wiser though. She just kept on eating.

Weeks rolled on and Trish got fatter and fatter. When her clothes stopped fitting she just got new ones and didn't think anything of it. Not only did her belly grow, but so did the rest of here. The once bean poll was now a curvaceous woman. Trish had curved hips, a plump belly, a hefty rack, and other fat features like a double chin and wobbly arms. She friends stayed silent, as they knew Trish had no idea she had blown up. Trish still pranced around like she was pin thin. She even some times taunted the other girls about how much she could eat and not gain.

By the end of the semester she had become bigger than all of her friends. She had packed on 100 lbs and doubled her weight from when she arrived at college. During the second semester Trish was starting to eat even more. She noticed her appetite had increased and she was hungry all the time.

While Trish packed it away at the cafe she would brag to her new college friends about all of her old fat high school friends. She told them that she bet when they went off to college they got super fat and couldn't help them selves. Her friends snicked but not at the story but at the irony. Although her friends let her get this fat, they were still truly friends with Trish. They helped her up from the table when she had eaten to much to do it on her own. They would change seats with her when she had gotten to big to squeeze into a booth.

After a few month's Trish was tipping the scale at 250. She was one of the biggest girls on campus, and she was the only person that didn't know it. Her friends had all tried to get her to diet many times, but gave up instantly when Trish denied her problems. They didn't want to tell her she was as fat as a cow, but any time they danced around it their plans never worked. Some of them would confide in her that they were having weight issues, and when they asked for support, like a gym buddy, Trish always pawned them off on someone else.

Trish thought very highly of her self, so it's wasn't until one of the fat computer nerds asked her out that she realized there was a problem. "Who does he think he is asking me out? Doesn't he know I'm way out of his league?" Trish complained to her friends. "He told me he wanted to take me to an all-you-can-eat-buffet, and that he would let me have as much as I wanted. What a creep." Trish, for as oblivious as she is, felt that this guy had asked her out because the thought he actually had a shot with her. It was at this point that everything was starting to come into focus. The size 18 dresses she now had to buy instead of zero. All the attempts to get her to go to the gym, or diet with the rest of the group. All the mobility problems she was starting to have, like the showers getting way too cramped. Everything was hitting her at once. Was she actually fat? Had she gained weight for the first time in her life? She looked at her self in a mirror and saw the same thing she saw all year, herself. She didn't notice the changes but they were there.

She went to the bath room and weighted herself. The scale came up at 256. "Holy crap, last time I stepped on a scale I was 100 lbs. I've gotten so fat." Trish decided she couldn't reveal this to anyone. She was going to start dieting and hitting the gym until she back down to her old size without anyone realizing.

Old habits die hard though and Trish couldn't help but eat her fair share at the cafeteria. When ever she had a break to go to the gym she was either too tired or too hungry, and ended up at the cafeteria instead. By the end of the year Trish stepped back on the scale to she if she had lost any weight. The scale topped out at 300 lbs. "How could this be? I'll never lose weight at this point."

Trish couldn't get the will up to actually lose weight. Summer came and her eating continued. The whole time she wanted to lose weight but didn't do anything to make it happen. She told everyone she was on a diet, but then proceeded to eat everything on the menu.

It not only kept her belly full it also gave Claire someone to be close with. With all the ups and downs at the start of Claire's journey her parents very nervous that Claire was going to up and quit when the road got too tough. But now with Jen in the picture Claire was happier than ever. This meant they had too keep Jen's tummy full too, but it was a small consolation. The girls constantly pigged out over at Claire's house where the treats were never ending.

In the back of Claire's mind she knew she was doing all this eating for a reason, family tradition and competition and all, but mainly her appetite and sweet tooth had grown so large she just loved to eat. Claire's passion had soon become Jen's as well. Jen loved eating almost as much as Claire did and it really showed.

Winter break came and the girls were out of school for a whole week. Of course the only thing on the agenda was food. You would think that the two of them would get bored of eating all the time, but they really didn't. Christmas turned into a new year, and the girls sat around thinking of some new year resolutions. "Jen what do you want out of this coming year?"

"First thing on my list is another slice of this delicious cake your mom made us." Jen rolled off her pudgy back where she was laying on the floor of Claire's bedroom. She proceeded to cut a big slice of the triple layer cake that was on a cake stand next to her.

"Yeah my mom really knows her way around the kitchen. Maybe that can be my new years resolution, learn how to cook and bake. I mean we only have three more semesters until we graduate. What are you going to do when that happens? A lot of our class mates are doing college visits this spring."

"I never really thought about it. Never really pictured myself not going to college. Seems like the next step. What about you, do you want to go to college?"

Claire answered "I'm not sure. My mom told me that all I had to do was win this family contest and my life would be on track after that. I wonder what that means."

"But what happens if you lose?"

Claire was stumped and took a moment to answer. "I never thought of that. I guess I always thought winning was a the only option. And I mean how can I not win, I'm almost 300 lbs."

"No way, you can't be that big." Jen's mouth was agape.

"It's true, I weighted myself the other day. 297. I'm the biggest girl in the school. There is no way my cousin Diane is bigger than me."

"I still don't believe you can be 300 lbs. You look like your 225, 250 max." Obviously Jen didn't know what 225 looked like considering she was nearing it.

"I'll prove it to you, come to the bathroom." The two proceeded to the bathroom where the scale confirmed that Claire was 297 lbs.

"You look damn good for 297 lbs dear. I know I'll never be that big, but you look better than me and I'm only 165."

"Don't put your self down. Your wicked hot for 165. It's not the number that matters it's how you feel about your self. And even if you were ever to hit 300 I bet you would be just as beautiful as you are now. But your not 300 lbs your still 165, and what is 165 lb Jen going to be doing in a year and a half?"

Jen demolished her cake as she thought, cutting off another piece when she was done. "Well I want to go where you go. If your not going to college then I'm not either."

"That's pretty short sighted don't you think." Claire replied with a heaping full of cake attached to her fork.

"Well it's true. I don't want to go off to college without you. Who is going to come to the cafeteria with me for all my meals, and explore all the restaurants the town has to offer. Also if your not there I won't be able to mooch off the amazing care package your mother would most certainly send."

"Jen you don't need me there to enjoy all those new experiences, you will meet new people and have tons of new friends. And I'll still be here for when you come home and want to have a slumber party away from your vegetable eating parents."

"I guess your right. Maybe we should start cutting down on your sweets so you end up bombing this competition..."

Claire grabbed the cake stand that was holding her cake that was previously resting on her night stand. "Don't even think about messing with my sweets. I'll stab you." Claire started jabbing her fork in Jen's direction.

"Clam down, no one is taking your sweets away. Speaking of, looks like mine is all gone. Looks like your the loser that goes down stairs for the next round."

"Fine fine, just let me finish." Claire retorted. Surprising how long these two could go on about food. The future was still up in the air. Would Claire win the crown in the family when all was said and done? How big was her cousin Diane? What did winning entail anyways? And what was Jen going to do with out Claire? Jen's parents would surely kick her out of the house after graduation. Would she go on to college or find a job? Maybe the girls stick it out together, at college or other wise. Only time would tell. One thing was for sure though, their obsession with food would not falter.
131112111111111.title: Claire's journey continues.

choices: The night of the prom
1311121111111111.content:
As the spring rolled in our two best friends continued with their normal lives. Claire quickly hopped over the 300 mark and her parents had a party to celebrate. Of course Jen was invited and the two girls ate without abandon until they were both ready to explode. Claire's parents could not be happier. Their little girl had embraced their family's tradition, albeit hesitantly at first. Now it seemed nothing would slow down her gain. Their eyes glowed all night as they watched the two girls eat away at an entire table of sweets. Claire had indeed become the big beautiful woman that they wanted her to be. She was top heavy like her mom was, sporting a large bosom and full round belly. The double chin and plump arms helped define Claire's other chunky features. Jen on the other hand had kept her hourglass figure, it just happened to be quite the round hourglass. She had an ample chest like Claire but also had a huge ass that tapered into some chunky legs. She had a flabby spare tire around her middle, but it wasn't anything near Claire's. The two girls did still have a 90 pound weight difference. We could only imagine what Jen would look like with another 90 pounds.

Their spring semester wasn't very eventful. The two girls went to class, waited for lunch all day, enjoyed a rich lunch provided by Claire's mom, then finished the rest of their classes excited to go home and eat what ever was waiting at Claire's house. As the school year was ending the rest of their class mates were getting ready for the junior prom. This event got Claire and Jen nervous. They had spent the last 7 months not even thinking about boy or anything that wasn't food. Jen was having a hard time denying that she was almost 250lbs. And while Claire was ok with her large body she thought that no one would want to take her to the junior prom which left her a little sad on the inside. Neither one of them spoke of their insecurities about the prom until about a week before it was scheduled to happen. Claire decided to break the ice "So Junior Prom is like in a week huh?"

"Yeah I guess..." Jen said as she thought about how she really didn't want to talk about it.

"Anyone ask you to go?"

"Nope. And I'm not surprised."

"Why do you say that?" Claire was startled by her friends negativity.

"Why would anyone ask me out? All I've done this year is stuff my face and get fat."

"Because your the hottest girl in school. Just because you have some curves now doesn't mean your still not number one out there."

"I think I have more than just curves, these are rolls. Giant fat rolls."

"But your only 165 lbs, no girl that size could be considered fat. Come on be real, how many guys have asked you?"

"None. I'm serious." Jen was starting to get upset

"Well no one asked me either. I wasn't planning on going. But I feel like I'd be missing out on one of the big high school moments."

"What is there to miss out on. People get dressed up and then all the sexually charged teens try and find someone to get with."

"I heard there is a pretty good spread in the atrium..."

"So? I'm not going to go just because there is good food. I don't have anyone to go with."

"I heard it catered by Jumpin' Jack's."

"No. No way. They make the best food. Remember that office party your mom brought us to? I don't think I have been more full in my life."

"So your in?" Claire tried to entice her.

"I'm still not going alone."

"Well then come with me. I'll get all gussied up, squeeze this big bod into a hot dress and the two of us can go and have a good time together."

"You would do that for me?"

"Of course hun. Also I heard a lot of guys are going stag anyways so maybe we can meet a few 'sexually charged teens' while we are there."

"Well I won't hold my breath for that, but I can't turn down an invite for all I can eat Jumpin' Jack's."

"Great. I can't wait."
1311121111111111.title: April showers bring May flowers

choices: They drive to the prom
13111211111111111.content:
The night of the prom quickly came and Jen was on her way to Claire's to pick her up. Jen was pretty hesitant about the whole night, it was only her new found fondness for food that was making her go.

Jen had lied about only being 165 lbs back when the turn of the year came, because she was actually 210 at that point. As the spring rolled on and so did the pounds she was having a harder time denying that she was big. By the time the prom hit Jen was a whopping 250. Jen had never felt bigger. She wasn't nearly the 320ish that Claire was, but Jen was still one of the bigger girls at the school. The extra weight had at least been nice to her, giving her a mammoth chest and shapely rear. She was able to stay stylish and sexy, especially with the help of Claire's family. Jen's parents were no help when it came to coping with their daughters new weight. If Jen wanted stylish clothes their thought process was that she could lose the weight and wear what she already owned. But there was no way Jen was going to start dieting now. She loved food no matter how large it made her. She just had to deal with the repercussions a little bit more than Claire did.

Jen pulled up to Claire's house and walked inside. Meanwhile Claire was up in her room getting ready.Claire and her mom had spent all week trying to find a dress for her. It had been awhile since Claire had worn a dress and especially a prom worthy dress. The last time she had gotten this dressed up she was a third of her size. Her mom told her this was good practice for her graduation. She was surely going to be larger then and was not only going to need a dress for her schools graduation but also one for the big family get together. The two of them finally found a dress they liked but that was also able to be let out enough to fit Claire in it. So they had it tailored, and the night of the prom her mother helped her get into it. It took quite a bit of effort, but in the end it fit... snugly. The tight dress did wonders for Claire's figure. Her ample bosom was on display and the tight blue fabric hung nicely around her bulging belly. Claire twirled around in her room watching the bottom on the dress flow while at the same time watching her soft body jiggle.

Soon enough she heard some ruckus downstairs and knew that Jen must have arrived. Downstairs as Claire's parents and Jen heard heavy footfalls headed towards the stairs the all stopped and turned their attention to the stair case. Claire emerged with a big smile on her face as she walked slowly down the short stair case. Everyone watched as each step sent ripples through the massive teens body. Claire looked down to see Jen all gussied up herself wearing a tight pink number that hugged her curves equally well.

"Hun you look amazing." the first thing Jen said to Claire as she joined them downstairs.

"Looking pretty good yourself there. Where did you get that cute number?"

"Your mom helped me pick it out, thanks again Mrs. J."

"Well you two better be on your way, you don't want to be late." Claire's mom insisted. The two blubberous teens agreed and headed out to the car.
13111211111111111.title: The night of the prom

choices: Go with the boys
Stay at the prom
131112111111111111.content:
Jen drove as Claire's thoughts drifted off unto food. This was not unusual for her, I mean she was actively trying to get as fat as possible for her family's respect. But right now the thoughts about food were warranted for out 320lb prom goer. Claire has just spent the last few hours getting her self ready for the big night she had no time to eat. Not only had she passed on having a snack or two at home as to not ruin her dress or makeup, but she also wanted as much room in her belly so she could eat more at the prom.

"Do you think we are the only two people going to this prom strictly for the food?" Claire formed her thoughts out loud.

"Probably. But is that so bad?"

"Nope! I have been looking forward to this all week. I just hope I fit into my dress after tonight."

"Yea, me too. It's already tight as it is. But at least it shows off the girls nicely."

"You really do look hot in that dress. Your not going to leave with some guy tonight are you?"

"What are you going on about?"

"I just mean if I were a guy I'd find you irresistible so I was just wondering if you were going to be on the prowl tonight."

"I'm going for the food, and only going because your my date. I would never leave without you."

"Thanks, I'm glad you said that." With Claire's nerves abated the two girls pulled up to the school building. They were quite prompt considering the prom started at 8 o'clock and it was 8:01. Never the less the two hulking teens waddled up to the atrium. The crowd there seemed small and the two of them took their time dipping their toes in the water so to say, just like everyone does at the start of a school dance. After a minute or two the girls noticed where the food was being set up in the back of the atrium. Several long table covered in table cloths, maned by folks wearing cartering clothes was the tip off. While trying not to look like a lion chasing down a sickly gazell, the two made their way in that direction as fast as they could. As they got there they noticed all the serving dishes were empty. The pans had been set out and the little fire canisters were being placed under things that needed to stay warm, but there was not food. Jen caught the attention of one of the caterers and asked "Where is all the food?" The man must have been caught off gaurd since most people don't ask where the food is they just politely wait, but as he turned and saw the buxom girl with the fat ass and her rotund friend whom were asking he quickly put two and two together.

"The food won't be ready for awhile it just arrived. Sorry." He didn't look sorry. Claire's stomach clenched as she expect food when she got here and was now going to have to wait to subside her hunger.

"We need to do something to distract our selves. I'm so hungry I can't just sit here and wait, my stomach would eat it self. Let's go dance." Claire grabbed Jen by the hand and started in towards the gymnasium, not giving Jen a chance to object. Jen was at least giving a face of distaste. She really had no interest in dancing she was really here just for the food. She didn't even care about the social obligation like Claire did. She could care less about missing her junior prom. If she had been invited to a different party tonight catered by the same people she would have gone there. Claire would have too if the prom wasn't catered by them, but Claire was quite happy that she could dress up and attend her junior prom. It made her feel normal. Claire's high school life had not been what most would call normal. Over the past three years she has gone from an athletic 130lb teen to a enormous 320lbs girl. She was the largest girl in the school and her world had totally flipped around because of it. Eating and gaining weight was not what most high school girls prioritized. So Claire was excited that she got to live a bit or normalcy tonight, even thought she was totally going to stuff her face once the food was put out.

While all this was going on Claire and Jen had made their way down the short hallway into the gymnasium. The room was full of their fellow classmates moshed in the center of the room dancing with one another while many students hung around the edge of the room either to shy to dance or waiting for someone to dance with. Jen would much rather be on the edge of room than in the middle of all that chaos, but Claire had the opposite mind set. Claire dragged Jen into the middle of the fray against her will. Jen's attitude was quite odd for her. A year ago she would have totally been in the middle of the crowd getting her dance on, but as this past year had carried on Jen had lost some of her confidence. It was of course due to her new found weight. Jen had doubled in size over the course of high school and didn't feel great about it. She didn't hate herself, but she felt that the weight made her an outcast. Her only friend was Claire and we all know how that friendship played out. She also didn't feel sexy inside her skin like Claire did. Although Jen had a kickin curvy body, she was still without the stereotypical hot body she once had. She had given up the notion of having that body long ago but it didn't make her feel great knowing how fat she had become. So with her confidence lacking slightly she was in no mood to dance, especially with how jiggly she had been getting recently.

While Jen wasn't thrilled, Claire was having a great time. Here she was at her junior prom in a sexy dress in front of all her class mates living it up. Claire threw caution to the wind and was dancing her heart out to her favorite music. Jen soon got into it with her best friend and started to have a good time after a song or two. The girls were having fun but they were also creating quite the scene. As their class mates danced around them the two of them got quite the many stares from all around. Claire and Jen were two of the biggest girls in the school, let alone the junior class. Classmates watched on as these two plump girls jiggled and waddled around on the dance floor. Both their dresses were so tight that the full extent of their rolls were on display for the whole student body. Also their dresses were so low cut that their massive boobs could be easily seen bouncing to the beat. Claire and Jen were oblivious to the stares and were just enjoying the music and excitement.

Very quickly, to Jen's enjoyment, Claire was exhausted. She pulled Jen from the dancing masses and told her she needed a break. Although Jen was having a little fun she would rather be else where. As the two walked out to possible fetch some water, they both remembered why they were here in the first place, food. They rushed, albeit slower after all that dancing, to the food tables. As the approached they saw the enormous spread that had finally been laid out. They both squealed with glee on the inside, and found a place in line. Claire's feet were killing her and she could have really used a glass of water, but her hunger was more important than all of that. Claire and Jen both loaded up plates with as much as they could. There were plenty of options, and they both wanted a little of everything. Once fully loaded up they found an empty table and plopped down. The excitement in their eyes could not be matched. They ate as the music continued to play down the hall. Song after song played as the girls ate plate after plate full of food. Other students drifted in and out of the atrium, but Claire and Jen stayed, even as the biggest radio hit played that cause everyone in the atrium into the gym. The two of them were loving the food. The caterers were starting to take notice of the two large girls, they didn't really care about their feasting, they just hoped that they wouldn't run out of food. Either way it made for a great story back home, two large prom goers eat a whole catered meal.

Soon enough their thoughts became a reality when the food pans started to go dry. The manager had been smart enough to call in more food when he noticed everything getting low, mostly from Claire and Jen's extreme hunger. So as Claire and Jen finished their plates and went back for more they were met by the manager telling them there was no more to be had. The two stuffed girls were not satisfied. They went back and sat at their table for a little digesting time.

It was about this time that two scrawny boys approached the girls. "How does a catering company run out of food?" Said the shorter of the two boys.

"I know, did they not expect people to eat." Claire emotionally responded.

"You girls look like your still hungry." The short boy said again. By this time they had the girls attention and Jen and Claire were looking right at them as they stood next to their table.

"May we sit?" He asked. Both boys looked like they had to be freshman, and didn't belong at the junior prom. Claire motioned for them to sit and the shorter one set next to Claire while the taller one sat next to Jen. "Well you might not believe it but my parents are chefs and their food is way better then this stuff."

"Better than Jumpin' Jacks? Impossible." Jen blurted out

"It's true. We can show you if you'd like."

"How can you do that?" Claire asked

"Ditch this soup kitchen and come over to my place. My parents made bunch of food for a party that was cancelled so it's just all sitting at my house."

"Really?" Claire was intrigued, but then realized that she had only just met these boys. "What do you think Jen?"

Jen always in the mood for delicious food was also curious "Well if they say it's better than Jumpin' Jacks, I say we can't believe it until we try it ourselves. Not like this place has any more grub anyways."

Claire still on the fence, comes to a decision...

choices: Kenny and Jake force them to stay
The girls make their exit
1311121111111111111.content:
Claire decides to take the boys up on their offer. The two well fed ladies followed the boys out to the short ones car. Along the way Claire and Jen could be seen tugging on their dresses. After their feasting their expanded bodies were not fitting so well into their tight dresses. As they got into the car Claire started to think about why these guy would be doing this. Was it all really just to prove his parents cooking was good? Were these guys attracted to them? The questions would have to go unansered for now because they were quickly swept away to their destination.

"So you boys don't look like juniors, what were you doing at our prom?"

"Yeah we are only freshman. We wanted to see how easy it would be to sneak into the prom. Result: not very hard. So by the way the name is Kenny and that is Jake." Said the shorter boy. Kenny had strategically placed Claire in the front seat with him leaving Jake to take up the back seat with Jen.

"Nice to meet you guys. I'm Claire and this is my best friend Jen. We were not going to go to the prom but when we heard it was being catered by Jumpin' Jacks we decided to go."

"Why were you not going to go? It's your junior prom, big high school moment."

"No one asked us. So we ended up going together."

"No one asked pretty girls like you two, boy must be a lot of dumb guys your age." Kenny replied back

"That's what I told Jen. I mean she is a bombshell, and not a single guy asked her. I guess we're just lucky you two snuck into the prom then, huh?" Claire's newfound confidence was surprising even herself. She was being a total flirt. Kenny must not have lived far from the school because within minutes they were at his house. They welcomed the girls inside and walked them into the living room. "Parents not home?"

"Nope. Since they got the night off they went out. You two must be hungry."

"Well we ere promised food" Claire retorted.

"Well before we drop the bomb on you why don't we get started with a few drinks and some munchies." Kenny and Jake disapeared into the kitchen only to return with two bowls of chips and some sodas. The girls quickly started in on the chips while the four of them talked.

"Chips are lovely, but I thought we came here for some real food." Jen said as she took the last chip from her bowl.

"Alright, alright. No need to get antcy. We will be right back." Kenny and Jake left again, and this time when they returned they had with them two large plates of pasta. The girls started to dig into the pasta covered in Alfredo sauce. As they ate they quickly came to the conclusion that this food was not better than Jumpin' Jack.

"I'm sorry Kenny, but this is no where as good as Jumpin' Jacks. It's almost not as good as my mom makes. Didn't you say your parents were chefs?"

"Come on ladies we are just getting started. I'm sure you have plenty of more room in there. There is plenty more to be had, this is just the start. We have to ease into it." With that Kenny left to only return with a large cake. "Alright you girls want good, try this cake." The girls finished with their pasta, leaned in and started ripping off chunks of cake with their forks. Mouthful after mouthful was plucked off the tall standing triple layer cake but after a few bites the girls had more complaints.

"Pretty good, but I think I have had better. Your not living up to your promise Kenny. What else do you have?"

"I'll show you once you finish your cake." Kenny replied

"Come one, the whole cake, you can't be serious."

"No next course until the whole thing is gone!" Claire didn't even have a response she just started back in on the cake. It was pretty good she she didn't mind having more.

"Alright Kenny we finished the whole cake. Now you promised us amazing food, what are you hiding in that kitchen?" Claire tried to stand up from the couch but was met with restraint from Kenny.

"No, no. Stay here Claire I'll bring the next dish out. I swear you will love it." Claire was starting to get a little annoyed, but still had hope that Kenny would deliver on his promise. Next Kenny brought out meatloaf. Each plate had a heaping pile of it, along with a side of buttery mashed potatoes. Claire was curious as to how meatloaf was supposed to top the cake they just had but I guess it was some pretty damn good meatloaf. Both her and Jen started eating, and this time they were surprised how good it was. Maybe not the best, but not bad.

After eating half her plate Claire was ready for something else. "That was pretty good Jake, maybe your not full of it. What else do you have? There has to be more back there."

"No no no, not until you finish your meatloaf Claire." Again Kenny made Claire finish before moving on. When they were both done Kenny and Jake brought out more. By now the girls were getting a bit full. The next course though was more sweets. Each girl was given a plate of brownies, cookies, tarts, and chocolates among other thing. Sweets being their favorite they dug right in. The plates were towered high but they ate each morsel one by one. As the plates neared completion their belly were really starting to feel full. Their dresses were noticeably tighter, but it didn't stop them from continuing on. The boys looked on with lustful eyes as each girl put away the pile of treats.

As they finished they were forced to lean back and rub their full bellies. Kenny and Jake watched as the two girl digested the large meals with pleasure. "Pretty good spread Kenny but I don't think it lives up to the hype you gave it." Claire finally spit out after allowing her mouth to rest for a minute.

"Are you serious? That wasn't the best food you had ever eaten?"

"Not as good as what Jumpin' Jacks brings to the table." Jen added

"Well then I guess I'll just have to keep trying to convince you."

"I'm free tomorrow if you want to convince me then." Claire said she chuckled sending a small ripple through her fleshy form.

"No this isn't over, I think it's time you came into the kitchen."

"Kenny I'm not sure I can handle any more."

"Of course you can. After the appitiser you had at school and this little snack you must still have plenty of room in that big fat belly of your." Kenny was getting worked up

"Hey! Where do you get off calling me fat? The only reason we came here is because you said the food was to die for and it isn't. No amount of it is going to change our mind."

Kenny tired to lay the charm on "Aww come on Claire. Just come into the kitchen and you will see. One bite of what's in there and your whole opinion of this night will have changed."

"Alright I'll give you one more chance, but only because you are cute. But could you bring it in here, I don't think I can get up right now, this dress is a little restrictive."

"I'd love to but you girls really need to come into the kitchen to try it. Here I'll help you up." Kenny reached out and grabbed Claire by her puffy hands and Jake did the same for Jen. The two girls waddled quite slowly followed by the boys towards the kitchen. As they pushed past the double doors they realized the extent that Kenny was going through to feed them. There was food everywhere. On every surface there was a plate of something or a tray of something else, and Kenny's kitchen wasn't small, it was quite large. "Well what do you think?"

"That's a lot of food. Quite the party that got caned huh?" Claire said.

"Party? Oh yea. Well what ever you want it's your. I'm sure after you have everything you will be in love with it."

"Kenny, we are so full. I thought we were just coming in here for a small bite."

"Yeah that's all this is. I know you girls can handle it." Kenny handed Claire a clean fork and sent her off. Claire and Jen started eating but wanted dearly to leave. Kenny and Jake were starting to be weird. "Here sit in this comfy chair." Kenny sat her down in a lounge chair in the middle of the kitchen that had a tray table attached. "Get off those feet of yours, let me serve you." Kenny started bringing plates over to her and Claire felt obligated to eat them. The more he brought the faster she ate. She just wanted it to all be over. If that meant eating this feast, then that's what she was going to do. But quickly Claire and Jen hit capacity and were unable to each more.

"Kenny stop. This is too much. I'm so full."

"You can't be. Look at all the food that's left. Isn't there more room in that big belly of your?" Kenny grabbed Claire's defensless belly and gave it a shake.

"No Kenny. We are full. If I eat another bite I'm going to burst out of this dress." Jen said as she came to Claire's defence.

"I'd love to see that!" Jake said "Here have another slice of cheesecake!"

"No get that away from me!" Jen said as she pushed the cheesecake away while trying to stand up. "Come on Claire we are out of here."

"Where are you two going? You can't leave yet." Kenny pleaded.

"Thanks for everything Kenny, but we have had enough." Claire said as she followed in her friends foot steps. Claire rose from the chair taking a second to gain her composure. Wiping the crumbs off her pretty prom dress, that was almost ripping at the seams, she made her way towards the front of the house.
1311121111111111111.title: Go with the boys

choices: Jen and Jake are no where to be found

As the girls approached the front door the boys pleaded with them to stay. "You can't go. No more food, I promise. Just stay and relax awhile." Kenny tried anything to keep them there.

"I'm sorry Kenny, we are leaving." Claire retorted. In a last ditch effort to keep them there Kenny grabbed Claire by the wrist.

"No you can't leave yet!"

"Kenny! Let go of me!" Claire used her massive weight to pull back but Kenny held on. The two started to pull back and forth. When Kenny would yank, Claire would yank back. Claire's body shook violently and the two of them struggled. When it seemed that Kenny was starting to lose the battle, they were both pulling as hard as they could, out of know where a loud rip was heard coming from Claire's dress. Claire's dress had completely rip down one side and fallen off leaving her bulging pink flesh only covered by her bra and panties. She quickly scooped up the dress and used the rag to cover herself. Kenny had long since let go of his grip on her. "Kenny! Look what you have done! Leave us alone!" As the two of them started out the door Kenny said one last thing.

"Where are you going to go? You didn't drive."

Claire turned back around with a face mad as can be "Can you please give us a ride back to the high school?" Claire said as she gritted her teeth.

"I will, but do you really want to go back only covered by shreds of dress?"

"No but what choice do I have."

"Stay here a minute and let me see if my mom has anything you can borrow."

"Fine but then we leave."

Kenny must have been kicking himself for going up the stairs first, he got to miss a great site. He lead her into his parents bedroom where she sat on the bed as Kenny rummaged through his parents closet. "So you and Jen are pretty good friend huh?" Kenny tried to spark a little conversation.

Well let's go downstairs and tell Jen. I'm sure she is worried about what's going on." Kenny fits Claire with the sheet toga and the two of them head downstairs.

As Claire reaches the downstairs donning her new sheet toga, Jen and Jake where no where to be found. Kenny and Claire started to search for them but quickly heard giggles coming from down one hallway. As they approached the door they noticed a quickly drawn up 'Do Not Disturb' sign hanging from the door. There were more giggles that were obviously Jen's. As Claire went to go open the door Kenny stopped her. "What are you doing?"

"Checking up on my best friend."

"I'm pretty sure she is just fine. Let's leave them be, we are not leaving this second anyways." Kenny lead Claire back to the kitchen.

"So what do we do to pass the time?"

"Are you hungry or anything?"

Claire shot him a menacing look. "Don't get started bub. Food is what put you in the dog house. Why don't we just watch a movie?"

"Sure I'll put one on in the living room." Claire and Kenny took up spots in the living room. Claire made sure to sit a bit back from Kenny a bit, didn't want to give him any ideas. The movie played and all was well until Kenny got a message on his phone. "I'll be right back." He said as to quickly left the room and went into the kitchen. I moment or so later he reemerged and looked to be holding a tray of some sort. Claire couldn't see because Kenny's back was to her. Kenny took the tray down the hall where Jen and Jake were, and then returned a few minutes later.

When he arrived back Claire asked "What was that all about?"

"Oh nothing, just a special delivery. Where were we?"

Although Claire thought this guy had an obsession about her eating she was starting to get kind of hungry. "Well I was hoping to have a little snack."

Kenny's eyes lit up "But of course, why don't we go into the kitchen and grab something." Kenny again helped Claire up, the seats were just so deep once you sat in them. They once again found them selves in Kenny's kitchen, surrounded by food. Claire went and set in the chair she had before and allowed Kenny to serve her a plate.

As Claire ate Kenny warmed up another. "What else would you like my dear?"

"That one!" Claire said as she pointed across the room. Kenny complied and started heating up and serving any dish she wanted. Claire chewed and chewed and finished plate after plate. The big girl had made substantial room in her gut after a bit of resting and was looking to eat a whole lot. Claire kept pointing out plates and Kenny loaded them on her tray. After a while he was just grabbing what ever was left because the plates had become so few. Even after getting so cleaned up she was making a total mess of herself. Kenny looked on in wonderment. Sadly she wasn't wearing the same skin tight dress as before, which Kenny could see every bulge that existed, but he had wrapped her sheet dress tight enough to see some definition on her. Claire was totally in her natural eating frenzy. Maybe it was the newfound freedom her belly had? Maybe it was the fact that Jen wasn't around and Jake wasn't watching? Or maybe it was the fact that our tubby teen was just down right hungry.

Claire finished off plate after plate until there were no more plates to be had. "I was wrong about you Kenny. Your parents cooking is good. I could eat like this any day of the week." Claire licked her lips and brushed a few crumbs off the sheet where her boobs had caught some. She proceeded to rub her massive belly as she usually did after such a big meal. "This is how a girl is supposed to eat. Nothing beats feeling full after a hearty meal."

"Not even a seven layer chocolate trifle?" Kenny made a delicious trifle appear before her very eyes. It was layered with cake and pudding and heavy creme and looked to die for.

Claire snatched it out of Kenny's hand "Ooo, tasty." and started to dig in with a large spoon. Now this desert look like the size you would bring to a family outing and share with all the relatives along side an apple pie, not something you keep to your self and eat the whole thing. Now I'm sure Claire wouldn't turn down a whole apple pie as a precursor to this trifle, but right now she was going to town on this bad boy. Large spoon fulls of cake and pudding topped with creme and what ever other secret ingredients were in there ladled one after another into Claire's wanting mouth. She kept sticking her spoon in until it finally hit glass. The whole thing was now in her belly, well except for the bits that got smeared on her face and the gloops that fell on her chest and slipped under the sheet into her cleavage. "Boy was that good. Please tell me you have another!" Even after all that eating and a giant trifle Claire wanted more. Her capacity and hunger were off the charts. She had just eaten a weeks worth of food and still wanted more. Sadly there were no more trifle's to be had. Upon hearing the bad news she started to lick the glass container from which it came to get any last bits possible.

As Claire sat there stuffed, Kenny was at her side in utter amazement at what just happened. Never in his wildest dreams did he think this possible. Claire was the living manifestation of all of his fantasies. He didn't want to overstep his bounds, but now that she was full up he wanted to have a little fun with her. Nervous to make a move, he was interpreted by the kitchen door opening.

As Kenny started to lean in to give Claire a kiss, the kitchen door swung open and Jen and Jake fumbled in. Jen was wearing a sheet toga now just like Claire was. Both parties stared at one another. Jen and Jake look at Claire as she was now covered with crumbs and had chocolate covering her mouth. Claire and Kenny stared at Jen as she had changed out of her dress into something more breathable.

Jen broke the silence. "Looks like you two have been busy."

"We were just grabbing a snack for the movie we were watching."

Of course the movie watching experience wouldn't be complete without a little more snacking. Claire's eyes lit up at the site of the large glass bowl. Each girl was given one and they both immediately went to down eating them. Jen became as infatuated with the confection as Claire was. Some time had passed after the prom and summer break was approaching. It was the day before Summer break and Claire was in her room alone. She was snacking of course, but also texting Jen. Claire was planning a day of eating to kick off summer and Jen was salivating at the thought.

“Jen you need to come over first thing in the morning. My parents are making this spread for us. I can’t wait!”

“Omg I’m so there.”

“I’ll be wearing the new pants I just bought; the ones will all the extra room. You should wear yours too.”

“Oh I’m going to need to.” Jen replied while looking at the pile in the corner of her room that contained all the pants she had out grown over the past year. Being a bottom heavy girl pants had become a struggle for Jen as she grew into her newly formed curves.

After a long back and forth the girls called it quits for the night. Claire tossed back the last snack cake in the box that she had been munching on this whole time. She was very eager for tomorrow and the rest of the summer.

The next day Claire woke up early with anticipation. She showered and what not, then donned her newest pair of loose fitting pants. She put on a top to cover her round midsection and large chest and then made her way down stairs. A breakfast feast had been cooked and her parents were placing the last few dishes on the table.

“There’s our lovely girl.” Her mother cooed as Claire made her way into the kitchen and sat in the extra sturdy chair her parents had procured for her when she started to outgrow their normal ones.

“You guys have out done your selves.” Claire noted

“I can take some of it to work with me if it’s too much.” Her father joked.

“Daddy, why would you do such a thing?” Claire played along.

Claire’s father ended up leaving for work soon thereafter and her mother retired to the study. This is when Jen arrived and knocked at the front door. Claire heaved herself up while finishing what was left of her donut.

The moment Claire opened the door Jen came lumbering in and put her arms around Claire. Jen was sobbing and muttering words that Claire couldn't understand. All she could do was hug her friend back. Their soft bodies held in an embrace for over a minute. Claire’s large form, mainly her massive gut, stopped Jen from being able to reach all the way around Claire not matter how hard she tried. Also their titanic chests were squished together forcing both pairs of boobs to find room where ever possible.

After about a minute Jen let go of her grasp on Claire. “Wow, something wrong Jen?”

“My parents are making me go to fat camp for the entire summer.”

“What?” But you’re not even fat, I would know I’m twice the size you are. 165lbs is average for girls our age, this is ridiculous.” Jen, as we know, was actually pushing 250+ at this point, but was in denial about how fat she had actually gotten.

“They say I have been getting gigantic and this is how they are going to put a stop to it. I don’t want to go, it’s going to be all salads and working out, my two least favorite things.

“I’m sure it won’t be as bad as you think. I’m going to miss you all summer though. I was so excited to spend all this time with you. When are you leaving?”

“Tomorrow” Jen said through the tears.

“Well at least we can enjoy today. Look at this spread my parents put out! Let’s start before it gets cold.” Jen was reluctant to eat, still very in the dumps about her predicament. Claire wasn't eating with her normal gusto since her friend was only nibbling at her food.

Claire wanted to cheer her friend up and get her mind off this fat camp business. “Here Jen try these fried eggs, they are to die for.” Claire plopped some eggs on her friend’s plate and Jen tried a bite. “Good right? Here have some hash browns to go with that, it really brings it all together.” Claire added a heaping of hash browns to the plate.

“Wow those are good. Can I have more?” Jen said as her tears started to dry up.

“Of course!” Claire piled more on Jen’s plate, and Jen started to eat it all. Jen’s tears cleared up and she started to eat at an increased pace. Claire had a smile on her face now and picked up her pace too. Donuts, danishes, eggs, sausages, pancakes, cakes, waffles, potatoes and much more went plate for plate. The girls ate until they were stuffed. They leaned back in their chairs while the table lay as a wasteland of empty dishes.

Their full bellies were extended in front of them. Claire’s was so large her shirt could only cover half of it, and it would have loved to ride all the way up to her chest if Claire had allowed it. Jen on the other hand was in a similar predicament. Her belly was so full it was testing the strength of her new pants. The pants were already tight from having to house her plentiful rear but now her stomach was so full it was adding pressure to the front.

The girls took a rest in the living room, but soon Jen's mind wondered back to fat camp. Claire wipped out her secret weapon, more food. "Here Jen have some brownies." Claire said as she practially shoved it in Jen's mouth.

"Claire I'm actually pretty full from that breakfast." Jen said as she swallowed the brownie chuck that was forced on her. As she let the brownie settle in her stomach her mind started to change. "But on second though, those are pretty good. Give them here." Claire gave Jen the whole batch of brownies and Jen started to eat them one by one.

As the day went on Claire kept Jen completely full. When ever Jen started to think about fat camp Claire was lightning quick to feed her something. After a few hours Jen had almost completely forgotten about fat camp, and was stuffed to the gills. She was laid out on the couch, stomach high in the air full of food.

"Claire I'm going to miss this." Jen said

"Want more cinnamon buns?" Claire reacted.

"Yes, but really though, I have to leave tomorrow, and when I get back I'm going to be skinny and probably miserable. My eating days are over. My parents aren't going to let me ruin all the hard work from summer when I get back."

Claire sat there thinking about the reality of the situation. Her best friend and eating companion was going away. So much joy in eating came from sharing that experience with a friend. Claire wasn't going to give up or anything, but she was losing something near and dear to her. Claire thought about the past two years. Two years ago Jen was a skinny twig with big boobs, not even 120 lbs. In two years she had over doubled in size and was now this chubby teen that laid before her. She had even larger boobs now but also a thicker torso to hold them up. Her love handles and pudgy belly told most of the story, but the rest could be seen from below the waist. Her large booty and thick legs were much bigger than two years ago. Jen had gone from a twig to a curvy BBW in these past two years. She had found a passion on eating, and loved everything about it (well maybe not the fat part, but it was a natural side effect that she could tolerate.) All of that was being taken away from her.

As far as what has happened to Claire was obvious. Claire had tripled in size and was now the largest girl in school. Her eating may have started as a means to do her family proud, but Claire ended up falling in love with food and eating. She now sported a large belly and hefty rack. Before she used to be so flat. Eating had become main stay in Claire's life. She was always looking to the next meal or treat she would put in her mouth.

Ever since Jen joined the picture and really started to put it away like Claire was, the changes in the girls was quite noticeable. Their freshman year Claire only gained 30 lbs. Sophomore year when Claire started trying to gain she packed on 40 pound in the school year alone and another 50 over summer. This is when Jen started to gain too. During sophomore year eating out with Claire added 20 pounds to her frame, helping her add some curves to her body. But over that summer another 30 pound gain happened as Jen started to eat more. Going into Junior year the girls really threw caution to the wind and enjoyed all the eating they could no matter what the consequences. Their first semester Claire gained 50 lbs and Jen 30. Leading up to junior prom Claire had topped out at an additional 30 lbs putting her at 330+ and Jen was catching up to Claire with a 40 lb gain bringing her to 250+ lbs by the end of the year.

Claire's waist really benefited from the added support that Jen brought to the table. 130 lb gain just from summer and junior year alone. Claire didn't know what the future held, but was nervous about this change. She loved eating but loved having Jen around to share in the enjoyment. Having her parents wait on her and leaving her to eat alone wasn't the same. All she could hope for was that Jen would at least still hangout with her and encourage her eating habits.

"We can still hang out though right?" Claire asked.

"If I can't eat, your going to have to eat double for me. We are going to feed you so well that you are going to blow your cousin out of the water with how much you weigh." The girls giggled

"Well you're not on any diet right now. Let's enjoy this last day of feasting together."

"I couldn't have said it better myself." After that the girls ate to their hearts content. Later on Claire's father got home and cooked them both a delicious dinner. The rest of the night was dedicated to sweets. Pies, ice cream, cake, candy, baked goods, cookies, and anything else that looked good was demolished by the pair of fat teens. By the end of the day Jen's pants had burst at the waist, and Claire's shirt had become a bra. The two girls were so large and stuffed they couldn't move. Eventually Jen had to go home. They gave each other the best hug they could, and Jen departed. The summer wasn't the same without her, but it ended up being anything but boring.

Claire's dad asked her what she wanted for dinner and Claire decided she was in the mood for pizza. They ordered from the same place they always did and within 30 minutes the pizza was delivered.

*knock knock knock*

"Claire do you mind getting that? My hands are full." Her dad shouted.

"Sure thing." She shouted back. Claire's laziness usually kept her from answering the door during deliveries, but dire times call for dire measures. She waddled over to the door, salivating at the thought of the pizza. She had convinced her dad to order the same amount he normally would when Jen was coming over but of course she wasn't. She was going to chomp down on pizza all night. She opened the door and then her jaw almost hit the floor. Standing there holding the large pizza order was her old flame Steve.

Steve on the other hand almost toppled the pizza's when he saw large lady Claire standing inside. "C-Claire?" Steve stammered.

"Oh my god, Steve. It's you. You're a pizza delivery boy?" Steve wanted to be quick on his toes. He had already blown Claire off twice and didn't want to come off as an ass, even though he had no interest in Claire, especially now she had some how gotten even bigger.

"Yeah this is the job I was telling you about. It keeps me so busy. I've been meaning to call, but I just never get a night off." Steve looked like he could not get any more awkward.

"Oh don't worry hun, I know how things get busy." Claire still thought Steve had it hot for her, so saw no reason not to be flirty.

"Well I gotta run, more deliveries." Steve was trying to find an exit asap.

"Aww you can't stay for a minute? I'm even resisting the urge to dive into these pizzas right now." Claire had taken the order from Steve and placed it inside. Now there was nothing between them and Steve could see just how large Claire had gotten.

"Babe these pizza's don't stay warm forever." Steve said casually. Immediately his hands slapped to his mouth. 'Did I really just say that? Did I really call her babe? What was I thinking.' Steve could see Claire's eyes light up. He started to back away towards his car.

"Ok, well I'll see you again soon!" Claire said as Steve fled the scene back to his car.

"Yeah sure thing." Could be heard faintly from Steve as he got further and further away. Claire watched Steve has he sped away before closing the door and turning to her pizzas. She forgot how much she had ordered and her smile widened even more as she let the smell of the pizza over take her.

That night Claire enjoyed a smorgasbord of pizza, and come the next day she requested pizza again for dinner. Her dad thought it odd that she wanted pizza two nights in a row, Claire was usually begged for more variety than that. He also found it weird that she wanted to answer the door for the pizza delivery boy. She was usually complacent to sit and have it delivered to her in the living room, not having to lift a finger.

As the week went on every night Claire wanted pizza for dinner. Her folks compiled since they just wanted their little girl eating up every night, but they had their suspicions. After a few days they spied on her while she answered the door for Steve, and caught her making googly eyes and flirting with him. After that night they didn't ever question Claire's decisions again.

Meanwhile Steve was having it rough at work. The rest of the crew had found out why they kept getting an order from the same house every night that week, and taunted Steve about it. Steve pleaded with his boss to let someone else deliver that order. "Steven, they are our very best customer. Ever since that little girl realized you're the delivery boy they have ordered every night. They used to only order once a week. I mean I'm not going to mess with the golden goose, capisci? Just suck it up." There wasn't much else Steve could do.

Claire had started to come on to Steve the more and more she saw him. She started even getting gussied up for him. She'd put on some nice clothes, do her hair and makeup, it was like a mini date every night for her. She was also always finding reasons to keep him there longer. She'd get him into a conversation and keep it going so he wouldn't leave. This went on every night for the whole summer. As the time passed Claire got more courageous with Steve and Steve just got more put off by Claire. Claire would try and grab Steve's hand when he'd hand her the large pile of pizzas.

Steve's boss also wanted Claire to keep ordering for as long as possible. He would send steve out with only their order so he would be in no rush to leave. Claire loved having her extra time with Steve once she found out that he had no where else to be. It was an even better excuse to keep him waiting around. Steve's boss would also always send extra food for Claire, but Claire always thought it was Steve sneaking her extra treats. She was always so appreciative. "Steve is that an extra order of cinnamon bread for me? You are so sweet." Claire even got in the habit of eating some of her meal while Steve was still these. Eating was what Claire knew best, so why not share that passion with her new boyfriend. Steve was just disgusted and prayed that his phone would ring with an order from work so he could leave.

Steve felt like he could see the pizza blimping her up. The more and more slices she ate the bigger she seemed. Steve couldn't get the image out of his head of Claire eating every last slice of pizza and growing larger everyday. He didn't want to think about how long her pizza binge would go on.

This all lead up to the last week of summer. Claire was expecting Steve to have put the moves on her by now, but he was not taking things as fast as Claire wanted to. Steve always denied Claire's dates since he was always working (at least he had a good excuse) but she thought he could at least take advantage of their mini pizza dates. He had for obvious reasons not perused anything with Claire, but she was not going to let that stop her.

It was only a few days before summer and Claire was ready to make her move. She put on her sexiest outfit and waited at the door for Steve's arrival. He arrived at the normal time, carrying her large order. Claire opened the door for him and took all the pizza boxes, setting them aside for now. Steve was super nervous since Claire had obviously got all dressed up for him. He tried to make this his briefest trip yet. "Thanks Claire, see you tomorrow." Steve turned to walk away.

"Not so fast Mr. Hunk." Steve briefly turned back allowing Claire to put a beefy hand on his shoulder and turn him. Now that she was back face to face with him she moved in close and laid a peck on his lips. Steve obviously didn't kiss back, but Claire kept making the advance kissing him for a second time and moving even closer, even though Steve was backing up as he was getting attacked. Eventually Steve put enough distance between them that Claire broke off the kiss. It all happened within a few seconds but to each of them it felt like minutes. "Ah, I've been waiting for that all summer." Claire said as she donned a large grin.

"...uh..." Steve was speechless. All he could do is go back to his car and drive away.

"But where are you going?" Claire said as he left. "I was just getting started." Steve's car was bounding down the street within seconds. "Maybe I was too hot and heavy for him?" She said before turning back to head inside. 'Well he will just be back tomorrow anyways.' She thought as she picked up her pizzas and took them into the kitchen.

The next day Claire was relaxing in her living room like she pretty much had done all summer. It was about midday when she heard a car pull into the driveway. Her parents were at work but she wasn't expecting them home this early. Suddenly it dawned on her that today was the day that Jen was coming home. Claire heaved herself off the couch leaving the dent that she was used to making, and rushed as fast as her thick legs would take her to the door. Jen rang the bell and Claire was right there to answer. Jen was startled that a big girl like Claire could get to the door so fast. Claire was stunned to.

She had envisioned what Jen would look like when she got back, but what she got was nothing that she ever pictured. Jen had left as 250lbs, fatter than she had ever been, which wasn't a hard feat since her weight had slowly been climbing for awhile now. Claire could almost not remember how chunky Jen was before, she only had mental image of what she thought she would return like. Claire's picture of the old Jen was one with the perfect hourglass figure, Big perky boobs, slim waist, and curvy ass. Claire was shocked to see the results of what had really happened at fat camp

"Claire!" Jen squealed

"Jen!" Claire squealed back "You're fat!!" Claire exclaimed. "But why? What happened to fat camp?" Jen was indeed still fat. She was all of the 250lbs that she was when she had left.

"I went but it didn't turn out like I expected." Jen and Claire hugged and made their way inside and sat at the kitchen table next to the door.

"So tell me everything." Claire demanded.

"Haha well I got dropped off at fat camp. I was miserable all day. There were other fat girls everywhere. Some my size, some your size and some even bigger. I moped around until the grand assembly that evening. They stuffed all girls in this one room and this old lanky man took the podium. He told us that the camp director had passed away under mysterious circumstances. I like to think a fat chick hunted him down and did away with his evil ass, but I digress. So they had to replace the camp director and the guy they got had a very different idea of body image and acceptance. He didn't want to force us to lose weight, so instead of salads the meals were rich and hearty, and instead of waking up early to exercise we got to sleep in and relax for most of the day. They other girls were just as happy as I was. I'm sure the summer would have been better spent with you, but it ended up being way better than I had first pictured."

"But what about your parents? They must be so upset that you are still fat."

"Yeah, they are, but after I told them the story and how I really felt about my body they stepped off a bit. I'm sure they still don't agree with my choice, but I don't think they are going to bother me about it anymore."

"That's great. I for one am so glad you are still fat."

Claire's remark made Jen giggle a little bit. "Well I don't think I love being fat as much as you do, but it's a side effect of eating so well so I have to take the good with the bad. And I actually weighed myself because of the whole fat camp thing, and I found out I'm 250lbs. I had no clue how huge I was, I really am a fatty huh?"

"You got nothing on me Jen, I've got to be close to 350." Claire was indeed quite fat. Jen was round but Claire was a blimp.

Now that Jen had gushed about her summer, it was Claire's turn. She told Jen all about Steve and the pizza delivery, and she topped off the story with yesterday's kiss. "Wow" Jen said. Jen knew how Steve really felt, and that he was probably just doing his job and being polite to Claire because he had to, but she wasn't going to shatter the excitement that Claire had in her eye.

"Yeah, just you wait, we will order tonight and you can come and say hi with me. I'm sure he won't mind showing me off." Jen held her silence, but also came to think, maybe he had changed, maybe Steve was an alright guy after all.

The girls continued to hangout as the afternoon rolled on. Soon Claire's family came home and were glad to see Jen. Claire made sure to have her dad order pizza first thing when he got home. After about 30 minutes the pizza had finally arrived. Jen looked over at Claire and saw the biggest smile on her face. She was pretty confident that she had not seen a bigger smile than that before. "Come on Jen, thats him." Jen struggled to get her wide load up but soon they were both waddling over to the door. Claire opened the door ready for Steve to be on the other end. "Ste..." She stopped. It was not Steve standing there holding their large order of pizza, but a different delivery boy instead.

"Umm, hi." The boy said. Jen got the idea this kid knew what he was getting into.

"But where is Steve, he always delivers my pizzas." She asked the kid like he was supposed to have all the answers for him.

"Well the thing is" The kid started to say. "Yesterday after Steve came back from his delivery he was complaining to the boss that he didn't want to deliver anymore. He refused to keep going. Having gained 45 lbs in 12 weeks, Claire knew she could do better, and with her new job she was going to show everyone how fat she could get.

She arrived home that night after her interview glowing. She was so excited to tell her parents. On the way home she started doing the math to find out how big she would be after the next two years were over. She had just increased from 10 lbs a month to 15. With her new job she was hoping for 20 new ones every month. That would be an addition 480 after two years, putting her at 715 lbs. 'WOW! That's huge!' Claire thought to herself. 'I can't imagine how big that is.'

Claire came home and told her parents about her new job and her new goal. They were so proud of her for getting a job (and secretly excited that it was one she could put on a few at). At the same time they were amused that Claire's goal was 715 lbs. They knew that once she got bigger that her gaining would level off and there was no way she could put on that much weight each month. They even thought it was a stretch to aim for 20 lbs at this point. Claire had become a rotund girl. She had almost doubled in size from when she started high school.

Claire's parents had some news of their own. Sadly this news was not as exciting. They had received a video today from Claire's uncle. They played the video for Claire, and they all watched intently. The video was of Diane and her father. Diane was sitting at the dining room table, the table covered in decadent treats piled high in every direction. Her father narrated as Diane stuffed her face faster than Claire had ever seen someone. It looked like an eating contest with only one contestant, Diane.

And what a sight Diane was. At the beginning of high school, while Claire clocked in at 130 lbs, Diane had always been a big chunkier and was 168. The 38 lbs difference would be subtracted in the end, but Diane's life long sweet tooth was unleashed the second she stepped foot in her high school. The girl had been straight pigging for two years now, and although Claire had almost doubled her weight, Diane had more then doubled her original 168. Tipping the scales at 340, Diane was one of the biggest girls Claire had laid eyes on. Her measly 235 frame didn't seem all that big anymore. Diane's father ended with a couple jabs at Claire's family, and before they knew it the video was over.

Claire stood there with her jaw dropped. 'I need to beat that?' she thought to her self. She had 100 lbs just to catch up. The family hugged it out and proceeded with their night as usual. After dinner, during a long silence, Claire's mother got everyone attention. "Come on 'yall, are we gonna let some silly video get us down? That no good brother of mine was just showing off. I bet he even exaggerated her weight, she didn't look 340 to me. Back when I was 340..." She trailed off a bit. "Claire, you know we have the utmost confidence in you. You have had better and better results every month. You are gonna knock the socks off of Diane. She is never gonna touch your size when you hit 715 lbs. You are going to be the biggest queen ever!" Her mothers speech invigorated the whole room. "Now who wants dessert?!"

"ME!" Claire shouted.

131121211.content:
The next day Claire reported for work. Sales to her seemed slow, but she enjoyed two jelly filled donuts, an éclair and some cookies. With them she had some coffee, which gave her a thought. Why didn’t the bakery sell drinks and have some sidewalk tables to encourage traffic? She made the suggestion to Linda, who agreed. Within a month they were serving lattes and her shift was much busier- so much so that she missed her twenty pound target by 50%.

Then she decided to enlist her mom’s help. She began bringing home treats from the bakery and insisting her mom try them.

“But honey, you’re the one gaining – my days for that are past!” she objected.

“Mom, if you eat along with me like Jen does at lunch its stimulating – now do you want me to win this thing or not?”

Reluctantly her mom agreed, and Claire smiled to herself. Maybe her mom would get back to her 200 pound days. She suspected hr dad would like it – which was confirmed by his encouraging both wife and daughter to enjoy. Within two weeks her mom was eating larger meals generally and Claire smiled to herself. It was turnabout for what they’d done to her.

But despite that small success Claire was finding it difficult to achieve even a ten pound per month gain.

“This isn’t helping matters,” she confided to Jen over a couple of big Macs apiece at McDonalds. Claire had loaned her friend the videotape and explained what was going on. Jen had agreed to be more aggressive as her eating buddy at school, much to the wonderment of Steve, who was keeping an eye on both girls. Jen was not gaining as rapidly as Claire, but was beyond a size twelve. That didn’t stop them from having generous helps of dishes such as lasagna, tamale casserole, spaghetti and chicken fried steak with potatoes – always with dessert.

“It is as if they’re trying to gain weight,” Steven observed, uncomfortably noting that the voyeur in him was enjoying the show. Steven had a secret – although a jock to his classmates he had a secret obsession with heavier women. His Uncle was a physician who had books on eating disorders and before/after pictures of about obese people –the “before” shots of those in the 200-300 lb range had always fascinated him. But wanting to be popular he remained in the closet.

One day he decided to approach Jen about Claire

“Please don’t take offense. But I think I’ve been a jerk,” he began.

“Why?”

“I led Claire on for you, had a wonderful time, then ran and hid And I think you know why.”

“Thick chicks really aren’t your style? Hey, I’m no Skinny Minnie myself and don’t you know I’ve suspected that’s why we talk but never date.”

“I know that’s what I project – but it’s a lie,” he admitted. “Other guys who are attracted to bigger girls just do it – I’ve covered up. And while I’ve never led you on, I did Claire. I haven’t gotten that day out of my mind. What I don’t understand s why she eats so much all the time when she has to know its just going to make her bigger. Is that what she wants?

“In a sense, yes. Come to my place tonight and I’ll show you something you’ll need to see to understand.”

That night Steve and Jen watched the video of Diane and Steve’s brain nearly exploded – not from attraction or revulsion, but from a suspicion of what was really going on with Diane..

“That’s Claire’s competition and I’m her coach. Does that make things clearer?” Jen asked at the end.

“Ummm yes, but there is something else. That girl isn’t just competing with Claire for a reward. She is obsessive to the point of eating like an automaton. You and Claire enjoy your food – did she look like she was enjoying anything>”

“Not really – what are you getting at?”

“Its possibly an eating disorder, called Prader-Willi syndrome. Those with it can’t stop eating as long as food is available – they sometimes go into a coma from overstuffing themselves. Its so severe that those afflicted with it often have to be placed under control of a conservator and institutionalized. If its not done they will literally gorge themselves to death. My Uncle is the expert, not me, but she has all the symptoms.”

“So her parents are endangering her life by playing to her compulsive behavior?”

“Possibly. The only way to find out is to have someone who knows see her up close and in person. What if we arrange a picnic where both families are present? If it is Prader-Willi I think my Uncle can get an injunction to get her help.”

“That would likely disqualify Diane – or at least guarantee that Claire wins.”

“That’s true, but right now the concern is about Diane. Can you have Claire talk with her parents but not reveal to hem what we are up o?”

“I think so – let me try.”

Steve left Jen’s place with the video. He showed it the next day to his Uncle, who was shocked at Diane’s display. He agreed to attend the party, warning Steve that if he was right he would have a legal obligation to initiate a competency proceeding.

Concurrently Jen informed Claire about Steve’s renewed interest in her and she was ecstatic. Then she told her about Steve’s having seen the video and his concerns. At first Claire was angry at Jen, but then her anger shifted to her Uncle

“That SOB is just exploiting her for money. I bet she doesn’t understand or care about the challenge. I don’t either - not this way.”

“Steve has a plan to help her – but we need your cooperation. First of all the two of you need to become an item, which I don’t see as a problem. Then we need to set up a picnic with the uncles and Diane present. That way Diane can be evaluated for Prader Willi without it being obvious. Can you be a good actress for a month? And not tell your parents?”

“I think I have to – for Diane’s sake.”

That night Steve called Claire and invited her to dinner at a great Mexican restaurant. Her tight dinner dress fully illustrated her most recently acquired rolls and her full arms were on display from the short sleeved top. By now over 250 pounds Claire was very much a fat girl – but Steve, thanks to having come clan through Jen, wasn’t bothered at all. Claire saw his eyes on her and knew he was hooked. She felt giddy inside even as she knew they had a sting to plan.

The next week Claire invited Steve to dinner at her place to meet her parents. Claire’s Dad immediately detected that Steve was a fellow FA and they got along well. Claire’s mom was so focused on pushing food on both the young people that it was embarrassing – but knowing why they took it in stride. They also noted that Claire’s mom’s clothes were getting very tight.
The stage was now set for Claire to confront her parents.

“I need your help,” she declared. “I’m just not gaining fast enough. I want to meet Diane face to face and see just what she’s made of. I hope it will stimulate me! Why can’t we do something like have a picnic with her and my uncle?’

“Well, I don’t know,” her mom hesitated but her Dad jumped in.

“And I suppose you’d want to bring along your new boyfriend?”

“Exactly – I have something she doesn’t and it could demoralize her,” Claire replied.

Her mom caved to this logic as she stood and nervously pulled at her top. “OK – but you’ll need to extend the invitation. My brother doesn’t really like me.”

Two Sunday’s later families plus Steve, his Uncle, Jen and Jen’s boy friend gathered in Morris Park. The two sets of parents set up a massive spread of food. Claire nibbled modestly on the appetizers with Steve as did Jen and her date. Diane, however, barely spoke to anyone.
