Diane grabbed two and a heaping plate of potato salad, then went back almost mechanically for seconds. Claire an=d Jen had perhaps as third as much and felt stuffed. The pattern was repeated ith the dessert offerings – Diane simply ate compulsively like a pig on autopilot as her parents looked on.

Steve’s Uncle took all this in and concluded that Diane was indeed a Prader-Willi case. He approached Claire’s uncle.

“Pardon me, I’m just supposed to be here as a chauffeur/chaperone today but in reality I’m also a medical professional. I can’t help but notice your daughter’s eating habits – they seem a bit compulsive. Are you seeing anyone about them.”

“No, if its any of your business. We’re proud of our daughter and if she enjoys eating and being fat we support her. Its frankly none of your business!”

“Actually it may be. You don’t need o come to my office – in fact I’d prefer you get someone you’d be comfortable with as being impartial. But she exhibits symptoms of Prader-Willi syndrome and as a health professional I’m obligated to notify the authorities if you don’t take action yourself."

The face of Claire’s uncle became red. ”The next thing you’ll be saying is that we’re unfit parents. Well, she’s over 18 so we have no responsibility.”

“That s a legal matter outside my pay grade,” replied Stephen’s uncle. “But in addition to today I have seen the video you made. I can and will have her checked out if you don’t. I expect an opinion in my office within a week.”

On the next Friday Claire’s parents received word that Diane had been placed in a treatment center for eating disorders – the challenge was over with Claire the winner by default. She and Steven celebrated by joining Jen and her beau for an Italian dinner. It was one of many such foursomes they would share in years to come.

Claire continued working in the bakery until she married Steve after graduation. Claire’s uncle never spoke to her or her parents again. Diane luckily did recover and lived by herself for several years until marrying an FA. As for Claire’s parents, her mom never did lose the new weight she’d gained, probably due to the increased appreciation and attention from her husband

Not in Claire, of course, but rather the peculiar ability of her little friend to gain weight.

Whatever the downsides were, they couldn’t possibly have been outweighed by Rachel’s growing obesity…

"A new member!" gasped Julia heaving her body up to greet the potential member.

Julia rushed to the door, opening it up to unveil a chubby girl about 160 pounds.

Stacey was nibbling on chips at the table, and then there was the president brimming with excitement.

"Well...you certainly do look content." admitted the newbie.

"You bet! We here at the Fat Girl club offer relief and support to the heavy. We here reject the social pressures of dieting and tormenting practices like exercise. The girls of the Fat Girl club enjoy the pleasures of life not deny it! " preached Julia

Smiles grin on the faces of the surrounding members in response to their leader's true words.

However, the process of puberty had transformed Becky's metabolism. No longer would the fat she ingested be burned but aggressively stored. Her body suddenly refused to lose any fat. As a result her body ballooned. The trim body she so reveled in grew slow and smothered itself in layers of soft flab. None of her small clothes could fit, simple actions became arduous, and public opinion of her changed.

When she reached 130 pounds, it was obvious to all that she was the heaviest of her friends. Upon this realization, Becky began dieting. She miserably declined food and ate unsavory meals. Despite her sacrifice, she continued to gain weight. Becoming the butt of some jokes, Becky resorted to drastic measures, that which she so detested, exercise. All was futile. "Look, the thing is..." Becky gritted her teeth.

Julia leaned in. The other girls were too distracted busting out snacks to pay attention to Becky and Julia.

Julia had just grabbed Becky's boobs and juggled them in her palms.

Amy Wilson was waiting to take her meeting with the account manager, as she looked at her notes, she went over the points of the meeting, ''This will be simple,'' she thought to herself, ''in and out.''

It was in most sense a routine meeting, Amy worked for a company that sold and manufactured napkins in accounts, not exactly sexy, but the pay was alright, and she was taking a meeting with an airline representative to make sure that things were going well, to help make sure that their contract would be renewed without much stress in a year and a half. Her boss normally would have taken the meeting, but she had come down with a very nasty flu bug, and with Amy being there for a little over a year, she figured that Amy could handle a mundane, low level meeting without much problem.

Amy had been out of college for a little over a year. She stood 5'9, and weighed 120 pounds. Currently she was attired in conservative business attire, but could also dress up very 'fun' on the weekends, a hold over from her time in college, where she was a typical sorority girl, partying at house parties and then bars when she came of age. She had been popular, but was not currently seeing anyone. Amy wasn't insecure about her lack of a boyfriend at the moment, because she knew she was hot. Her black hair and sharp features went well with her toned body. Although she played soccer in high school, Amy did not continue that in college, and stopped working out--her metabolism and sensible dietary habits kept that from becoming an issue, and after a year of work, her weight was as stable as could be. All of these things led her to be generally happy with where she was in life, and with her girlfriends who lived near her downtown, she had a great social life to complement her job.

So Amy sat in the waiting room, in her work dress pants, a trendy female blazer and dress shirt, when he entered. The 'he' was David Rollins. Amy had only known the name as someone on her appointment calendar. She had never expected him to be so young. He was 6'1, had a great face, and looked like he probably was pretty well built under the suit he was wearing. Amy was slightly caught off guard by how attractive he was.

Their meeting began and the two hit it off, joking about the mundane nature of napkins and their irrelevance to an airline's operating abilities. David expressed his desire of the company to renew the contract when the current one was up, quickly making Amy feel more comfortable in knowing she would have good news to bring back to the office.

After the meeting, David did something a bit unexpected,

''Hey,'' he asked Amy, ''want to meet me for a drink after work?''

Amy was surprised, but was wondering if he was single throughout the meeting, so she accepted.

''Great, well do you work around here'' he asked.

''Yeah, just down the street, want to go to that new place that opened up off tenth street?''

''That works, I will see you then.''

Amy left pleased wondering how that meeting could have gone better.

"Well Lindsey I'm looking for someone to look after the bakery so I don't have to be here so often. The store is quite small and can be managed by just one person. Think you are up for the task?" Lindsey had never taken a job before so she was up for what ever came her way.

"Oh before I forget." Nicole inturpted the current train of thought. "There is an employee discount on everything in the store. You get 50% off and the money just comes right out of your pay. A new laptop. $350 worth of gift cards. New boots. And a selection of new clothes. Amy's Christmas haul was extraordinary. After spending two weeks at her family's house for the holidays, Amy now had three days back in her apartment before classes would begin again. Yet what struck Amy the most about her Christmas vacation was not the gifts (although some of the clothes did play a part). It was something else that caught her eye today.

Amy stood in front of her mirror, examining herself. She wore new black jeans and a purple turtleneck. Judging by her reflection, however, they were not going to fit her any time soon. Amy couldn't button her jeans at all and the turtleneck clung tightly to her midsection, having rode up to just above her navel.

If she had tried them on before the holidays, they would have fit just fine. But lounging around her parents house and treating herself to sweets, in addition to massive portion-sizes for her regular meals, meant that Amy was consuming a lot more energy than she was using. And those extra calories added up around her belly.

Amy had weighed herself this morning. 140 pounds. Up 10 pounds since September. She was surprised that the number wasn't larger, considering just how lazy and indulgent she had been. Most of the weight had settled into a pudgy pooch of belly fat, although she did now have the beginning of some love handles and did seem to be generally flabbier all around.

Amy looked at herself in profile. She sucked in her gut, then buttoned up her jeans, tucking her turtleneck into them. She let it out, causing her turtleneck to ride up. Her jeans felt like they were about to burst, so Amy carefully in unbuttoned them again. Her belly lurched forward upon having the button's pressure removed.

Curious, Amy pushed her belly out, making it even bigger than it already was. She turned back around. Amy rubbed the bottom curve of her belly. Taking it in both hands, she gave it a shake. It wobbled, and the movement... Intrigued her.

For some reason, Amy found that she didn't mind her weight gain that much. If anything, she could have sworn that she liked it, of all things. She liked how round and soft her belly had become. She liked the way it jiggled. She liked how it was so large. There was no desire in her to lose the weight. If anything, she wanted to gain a bit more. She imagined herself fatter, with a potbelly and a muffin top. It was an image that Amy didn't find unappealing in the slightest.

Wait—am I actually considering gaining weight? Amy thought to herself. But it wasn't such a bad idea in her eyes, she realized. After all, she could always lose it if she wanted. But there would still be the trouble of having to deal with it.

Before Amy could reach a definitive conclusion, her stomach rumbled. She was hungry, and it was almost time for dinner.

15222222222222222221.title: Fattening cruise it is!

choices: "Welcoming Ceremony!"
"Buffet!"
1522222222222222222122.content:
"Carol, hurry up, will you?" Harold called towards his wife, who had stopped to grab a corndog before heading on board the ship.

"Oh, sorry dear!" Said Carol. Carol is 38, which shoulder length, brown wavy hair, chestnut eyes, pale skin, few lines on her face and a small paunch. Well, more than a small paunch. Standing 6 feet tall", Carol was about 210lbs. She bit into her corn dog as she huffed her way towards her husband, who was already entering the ship. "Sorry, I was just hungry," she apologized again. Harold, Carol's husband, in contrast to his large wife, was 5'6" and a scrawny 120lbs. The height difference had never bothered him, but the weight difference had only come in recent years when Carol got a desk job across the street from a bakery and a McDonalds. Harold had dark blue eyes and short, starting to recede black hair, the sight of which he dreaded at age 36.

"Carol, dear, I thought you were going to stick to your diet..." Harold said, intending to sound gentle but letting his agitation slip through.

"Oh, Harold, I already told you. I don't NEED a diet!" Carol chuckled. "I'm just as slim as the day you met me and anything I gain here I can lose in half the time back home!" She said in her usual chipper tone.

Harold sighed. His wife was clueless, as always. It's not like he didn't love her, it's just that... their marriage had lost it's passion. Harold couldn't remember the last time they did... IT. Well, he could, and it was back before his wife let herself go. Harold was embarrassed for her and for himself for letting it happen.

Carol and Harold dropped off their luggage in their room and checked the schedule. Harold mumbled his way through some safety guidelines, but then Carol snatched the booklet out of his bony hands. "Oooh! Harold, look!" She exclaimed. "There's a(n)..."

choices: He confronts her on her eating.
"Fun? I'll show you fun! I'll have the most fun with you I can if it kills me!"
15222222222222222221222.content:
"There's a buffet! And it runs all night! Oh, I'm just starving!"

"Carol, you just had that corn dog..." Harold said meekly.

"I know, they just make them so cheap these days. Not filling at all. Let's go!" And sooner than Harold had time to blink Carol was dragging him in the direction of one of the dining rooms on the ship. This restaurant had an uptown grill kind of feel and specialized in burgers, ribs and the like. There were other spots that supposedly had the best pizzas, pastries, ice cream, drinks and even gourmet dining, and all of them had buffets that were included with the price of entry.

Harold felt a pit of dread in his stomach. Carol, on the other hand, had piled a plate high with fries and a thick, juicy cheeseburger. The conversation that dinnertime was small and short. Harold had a chicken salad. Carol had two platefuls. Harold decided not to comment.

An hour after they had started dinner Carol leaned back in her seat and heaved out a satisfied sigh. "They KNOW how to cook here, huh honey?"

"Yeah..." Harold sighed, but not in any whimsical way.

"Something wrong?" Carol raised an eyebrow.

"No, no, it's nothing. Should we head back to the room now?"

Carol rolled her eyes and grinned. "Already! Come on, Harold, there's an entire ship to explore and it's only 8:00!" Harold's face was unmoved. "Fine, you can go lay down. I'm gonna have fun! Just gotta... lay back a bit first..." She rubbed her swollen paunch and belched. "Oh, ho! Excuse ME!" She giggled. Harold sighed and trudged his way back to the room.

Four hours later, around midnight, Carol came stumbling back into the room. If she had looked swollen when Harold had last seen her, she was ready to pop now! Her stomach strained against her tight red dress, leaving no curves to the imagination. If it were possible to gain 5 pounds in 4 hours she had certainly found a way. "Oh Harold, baby... There's so much FOOD on this ship, I *BEEELCH*... I might have stopped at the bar too..."

Harold rushed over and helped his wife lie down. She continued in a slurred speech to describe the ice cream parlor. "There's like 50 flavors! I gotta try them all... and the boys working there are CUTE!" Harold grimaced at that. "Oh, come on Harold, baby, you're a cutie too..." Carol pulled him close. Her breath told him that she HAD indeed been to at least one bar. "Wanna... Help me work off that meal...?"

Harold pushed himself away from her. "Carol, I can't. You're drunk and you need sleep."

Carol gazed up at the ceiling and whined. "You never have any FUN anymore!"

Harold narrowed his eyes...
15222222222222222221222.title: "Buffet!"

choices: Harold looks for a way to apologize
Harold leaves Carol to stuff herself into oblivion
152222222222222222212221.content:
Carol gazed up at the ceiling and whined. "You never have any FUN anymore!"

Harold narrowed his eyes. "Carol, I'm just trying to be responsible! Unlike you with your obsessive binging!" Carol propped herself up on her elbows and looked at him. Harold continued to rant. "All you've done since we've got here, and for the past few months even, is sit around and eat! It's too much! You're eating yourself into an early grave. Just look at yourself! You're turning into a pig!" He was getting red in the face.

Carol looked down and crossed her arms over her gut. "I have no idea what you're talking about." She said adamantly. "I would just like to have a nice cruise with my husband. But until he decides to be a good husband, I'll have this cruise on my own. Good night, Harold." She promptly passed out. It would have been rather comedic for Harold if it weren't frustrating. He let out a sigh and got into bed as well. He figured he could apologize and set things right in the morning.

Morning came, not through sunlight through the window but an alarm on the nightstand next to the bed the couple lay in. Harold rose first and switched off the buzzing clock. Moments later Carol rose up with a groggy groan. "Good morning dear," Harold said.

Carol looked over an Harold and nodded stiffly. Harold shied away, wondering if she remembered last night. The two got dressed in silence. The air in the room felt suppressing, in contrast to the light teal walls with depictions of white beaches. Harold opened up the pamphlet and perused some of the activities on the ship that day. "Huh, some of this looks interesting. Anything you wanna do?" He asked Carol. She didn't respond.

Harold sat down on the bed. "Honey, I'm sorry about last night. I shouldn't have gotten angry with you like that. We both need to be more careful. Carol let out a huff and opened the door. "Where are you going?" Harold asked.

"I'm off to have breakfast. I am a gluttonous pig after all." She said plainly.

"Carol, I'm sorry!" Harold called out, but his wife was already out the door. He sat down and sulked. "This cruise was a bad idea, and it's just getting started..." He moped.

He waited until around noon before he went out to search for Carol. He found her at one of the buffets, stuffing herself. Her plate piled high with pancakes and waffles, coated with butter and syrup. She had been eating all morning. "Great." Harold thought sarcastically. "Just great."

For another hour Harold watched his wife gorge without end. He had no idea she could even eat so much! Eventually she got up and waddled out, clutching her swollen belly. Harold breathed a sigh of relief and followed her silently until he saw her entering the ice cream parlor and hitting the buffet there. The next day went the same, with Harold following around Carol shyly looking for an excuse to find something to say and Carol eating enough for an army.
152222222222222222212221.title: He confronts her on her eating.

choices: Carol asks Harold about dinner with Lorenzo
Carol attends dinner with Lorenzo the following night
1522222222222222222122212.content:
Harold decided that if Carol wanted to eat like there was no tomorrow, there was no stopping her. He decided to shrug it off and wait for her to come to her senses. He, on the other hand, would enjoy the cruise for more than just it's food. Harold spent time relaxing on deck, enjoying the pool, hitting golfballs into the sea below, etc. He only saw Carol in the morning when they woke up and when they went to bed.

Only a few days of this went by and Carol was beginning to grow. Harold hadn't noticed because of his new ideal of letting her be, but Carol's clothes, which once were tight when he was full, were now tight all the time. If he were to stop and think about it, Harold would realize that Carol was eating at least 50,000 calories a day, considering the volume of the food she was eating and how greasy and caloric it all was. He might have also noticed that as her stomach stretched out, she was eating more and more each passing day. By the time a week had passed, Carol was nearly tearing out of her clothes at 250lbs. Day in and day out she would stuff her greedy mouth. She had practically forgotten that the cruise provided other activities. "It's all just so good!" She'd tell herself. "Oh, I'm so stuffed. Well, I could just try another bite. Those crab cakes look heavenly, I couldn't have JUST one! And you know what they'd go well with! Butter!" She ate like a woman possessed until finally her dress gave way and split along the side seam. Embarrassed, Carol slipped on her skin tight jacket and waddled out, mumbling about the damn washing machines shrinking her clothes and disgusted waiters and guests stared.

The next morning Carol woke up early, her stomach growling. She hastened to slip into some clothes so she could start her ritual morning binge, but found nothing would fit on. "Oh, these too?" She grumbled as her biggest top pinched into her flesh and her jeans left a sizable muffin top poofing out. Just then, she heard a knock at the door. Carol did her best to cover up and peaked out. "Hello?" She called. Nobody in sight. However, at her feet were several dresses she had noticed in one of the stores on the ship when she had gone exploring for a food court of sorts in the area. They were gorgeous, clearly some of the more expensive ones, and when she slipped on one it fit perfectly! Carol stopped to admire herself in the mirror. The dress did hug her curves and rolls, but it covered her up. "Oh, wow! And to think Harold is upset that his wife has such nice curves!" She thought, feeling her blubbery sides.

Having dressed herself and done her hair up, Carol made her way up to her favorite restaurant. She liked it because it was close. Her favorite restaurant was always the closest one. She grabbed a plate and piled it up at the buffet, as per usual, and dug in. Within a few minutes, she had devoured all of her first fraction of breakfast. Carol heaved herself up to go for the next plateful, but a man in a ship's uniform took the plate out of her hands. "Allow me," he said.

Carol looked up. The man was tall, taller than her. He appeared Italian, with thick dark hair and darkened tan skin, He had a strong jawline and was well built. His chest barreled out and from what Carol could see, his butt was perky too! The man walked over to the buffet and filled the plate up with skill, in the sense that he was able to fill it even higher than she could, and within moments he had returned. Carol immediately began to feast again. The man let out a hearty laugh. "I'm honored to see how much you appreciate my cooking!"

Out of the few things he could have said to break Carol out of her trance, that was one of them. She looked up from her plate, mouth half full of sausage. "You're the chef?" She said muffled through breakfast meat.

The man bowed and kissed Carol's hand, causing her to blush. "Lorenzo D'Angelo. Head chef. I didn't make any of that stuff myself, but I oversee all the cooking on board, and there are few things I love more than when I beautiful woman such as yourself enjoys what I do."

Carol swallowed and smiled. "Well my name is Carol, and I love your food!" The two locked eyes for a moment. Carol then chuckled and stuck her fork back into her empty plate, not realizing she had finished it off.

"Oh, let me get that for you, miss!" Lorenzo jumped in and snatched her plate to fill it again. Time and time again Lorenzo would fill Carol's plate for her and bring her more burgers, pizza, pasta and fries to eat. All the while they would talk, which was really a one sided conversation since Carol's mouth was rather full. Two and a half hours passed before Carol began to relent to the tides of food Lorenzo had brought her. He had even begun bringing her two plates at a time. "Two plates? Oh, I just couldn't, Lorenzo!" She laughed, but regardless she began to shovel fries into her mouth.

"Nonsense, a lady such as yourself should have to qualms against indulging!"

"If only my husband had that perspective." Carol sighed. Lorenzo winced, but Carol hadn't noticed. Instead, she began to go on between mouthfuls about how he kept badgering her about her eating habits. "He even called me a pig the other night! We haven't been intimate in AGES! Oh, sorry! That was personal, I'm sorry." She blushed again, but it was hard to tell under the red, sweaty cheeks she had already grown from her ravenous feeding.

Lorenzo pouted. "No, it's fine. And if I may be so blunt, he is a fool to think you are not beautiful. There is so... SO much of you to admire..." His eyes traced along the curve of your body. "I must admit, I have been admiring you for some time. You've spent so much time enjoying my craft. If I had known you were married..."

"No, no, it's fine!" Carol cut him off before she could think. "And thank you..." She placed a hand on his. "I needed to hear that. Honestly, I've been worried I've been making a bit of a glutton of myself. But I suppose that's what people do on these cruises!"

Lorenzo took on a prideful grin. "If you have, then I take FULL responsibility. In fact, you must join me for dinner tomorrow tonight! I insist! Your husband is welcome to join."

"Oh Harold? He'll be off doing boring stuff. But I'd love to go, Lorenzo."

Lorenzo stayed to assist Carol's feast for a few more plates before kissing her on the hand once more and returning to work. "By the way," he said as he walked away, "I love the dress!"

And with that, Carol waddled back to her room to digest her meal. The bed groaned beneath all 260 pounds of her...
1522222222222222222122212.title: Harold leaves Carol to stuff herself into oblivion

choices: Harold was back
Harold was still not back
15222222222222222221222121.content:
Later that day, when it was time for bed, Carol came lumbering back to the room after a full day of feasting. Her new dress was already starting to feel tight, especially in her current state of fullness. As she opened up the cabin door she was surprised to not see Harold there. Usually he had been back by now from his day of 'being boring' as Carol had been imagining it. Carol dressed down into she sleep attire, unfortunately that part of her wardrobe had not gotten upgraded like her vacation dress had been, so everything she wore was overly small. The tee shirt did nothing to hid her rounder belly, and the little short were being eaten up by her chunky legs.

Carol decided to wait up a little bit for Harold so she could try and ask him to dinner tomorrow with Lorenzo. At the end of the day Carol was still a faithful wife even though they were having this disagreement during this vacation they had been waiting to take their entire married life, and she didn't want to accept dinner plans with another man without at least involving her husband. But Harold was no where to be seen. Carol had come back to the room a little early, but she thought Harold would have been back by now.

After waiting about an hour, Carol was starting to get impatient, and her stomach started to rumble. Usually not an issue because she was asleep by now, but after having not eaten for an hour Carol was ready for some more boat food. Since she wasn't dressed to go out she decided to bite her time by eating in. She called into the room service and ordered a few... dozen menu items. Not a moment later a trolley arrived at the door with Carol scrumptious meal. Sweets, comfort foods, and drinks were all packed onto the cart, so Carol wheeled it over to the couch and started in. She ate everything down in the same fashion she had been eating all week, fast and ravenous.

By the time she finished it was even later, and Harold still had not returned. "God where is he so late?" Carol steamed. Most of the boat would have turned in by now, the only place open would be some bars and dance places, and she knew Harold wouldn't be caught dead in a club. "He must be up to no good, that can be the only explanation." She proclaimed. She didn't know what ill advised things he was doing, but she was determined that something was up. She decided to go out and take a look herself. She wiggled on some shaggy slippers and crept out into the deck under the cover of darkness.

Carol poked around the few places closest to their room. Pretty much all the restaurants were closed, and the one bar in their area was pretty empty, it had gotten pretty late after all. With no site of Harold, Carol continued to look. That was until she came upon an open establishment. All the traditional restaurants in this area near the cabins were closed, but this ice cream bar looked to be open late for dessert. Carol decided to pop on in, you know to see if Harold was here.

He wasn't, but Carol didn't want to leave before grabbing a quick bite. There were no customers there, and just one attendant running the small joint. You would think he'd be taken aback by Carol's appearance, but this wasn't the first overfed housewife he'd seen over the course of his career.

The ice cream bar was buffet style just like most other joints in this place, so Carol decided to help herself to a nice big bowl and plenty of toppings. After the first bowl she went back up, and she found some premade favorites to try. Banana Split, Peanut Parfait, Brownie Blast, and more. She grabbed two and brought them back to her table. "Mmmm." She moaned. Quickly finishing she went up for two more. After trying one of each she decided to hit the bar one more time to craft her own creation. It had a mountain of ice cream, cookies, brownies, graham cracker crumbs, sprinkles, peanut butter cups, hot fudge, and completely covered in whipped cream. Carol was so happy with her discovery she decided to have just one more before she left.

After a feast of ice cream and sugar, Carol took her leave. She waved to the young boy behind the counter, leaving looking bigger than she was when she arrived. "Ma'am." He called out as she passed him. "If your interested I have this box of ice cream sandwiches I need to get rid of, you can take them with you if you'd like." He pulled out a box containing classic vanilla ice cream sandwiches, the box red 12. Carol's eyes lit up, not wanting to miss to indulge her appetite while on such a marvelous vacation. Everything else had been so good why stop now. She gladly accepted the gift and thanked the young boy.

After she had left the parlor, she peeled open the top of her box, grabbed out a sandwich, taking the wrapper off, and consuming the treat in a matter of mouthfuls.

The search for Harold had not gone according to plan. At the off set Carol had not been too hopefully, this boat was huge and Harold could have been anywhere. But at least she got some ice cream out of the whole thing. Carol waddled back towards her room, finishing her box of ice cream sandwiches rather fast. By the time she was back at her door she was just finishing the last one. She opened the door to her room to find...
15222222222222222221222121.title: Carol asks Harold about dinner with Lorenzo

choices: Carol goes to bed without another word
Harold has drunken clarity and patches things us
152222222222222222212221211.content:
Groggy eyed, Carol cracked the door to their cabin, looking to hit the pillows if Harold was still not back yet. But to her surprise he was. He was lounging on the couch, looking like he was just as groggy at this late hour as his wife.

“Harold, where have you been?” Carol asked, puffing from her shock that he was back. She was still holding the box that the ice cream sandwiches came in so she proceeded to waddle over to the trash bucket and throw it away.

“I could ask you the same thing.” Harold said kind of laissez faire, not very stern at all like he had been in the past.

“Are you drunk?” She asked, as she had noticed Harold had not moved from the couch and was not being his normal self.

“Maybe? Maybe not? What's it to you?” Now she definitely knew he was drunk.

“This is very unlike you Harold.” She huffed. She was starting to lose her focus, and had forgotten about the task at hand, which was to invite Harold to dinner with Lorenzo. It probably also had to do with the massive ice cream coma she had recently induced. “What has gotten into you?”

“You have!” He burst out, almost slurring. “Or should I say lack thereof… or the other way around. Me not in you!”

“You’re drunk Harold, you need to go to bed.” And with that Carol went to go help her husband up. He was agreeable, at least he was able to admit when he needed the help and when his wife was right. She grabbed his arm and heaved him off the couch with a tug, but then something made her take pause.

*Sniff Sniff* Carol smelled the air she now stood in over Harold. In a slow pressing voice she said, “Is that perfume I smell on you?”

Harold retracted instantly and his face turned to one of playing dumb. “What do you mean? I don’t smell anything.” He tried to brush it off.

“That is perfume, I know it.” Carol demanded. “Were you with another woman tonight? Is there where you were so late.”

“No, baby, no.” Harold bounced his syllables. “I was at this bar, and just minding my own business, and I mean this woman came over, and you know, just wanted to share a drink, and then her perfume must have just like got on my shirt.”

“And what else Harold? I know you are not telling me the whole thing. How many drinks did you have with this harlot.”

“I don’t know.” He panned. “I kinda lost count.” He mumbled quite cockily.

“You are a pig. Here we are on this romantic cruise, and you’ve been too busy to attend to your wife, and now here you are flirting around with another woman. And here I am, looking around for you so I can ask you to join me at dinner tomorrow with the ship's head chef because I am a faithful partner, and would never do something shady behind the other person's back. Such a pig. I’m not even going to invite you to Lorenzo’s dinner, I’m going alone, and I don’t care what you think.
152222222222222222212221211.title: Harold was back

choices: They talk some
Lorenzo has prepared even more food
1522222222222222222122212111.content:
After deciding to not invite Harold to her dinner with chef Lorenzo, Carol stormed into bed, not wanting to even look at Harold. The next day she awoke and immediately left the room before Harold could say anything to her. She bee lined straight for her favorite breakfast place, she wanted to start the day right. She knew she had big dinner plans with Lorenzo later that night, but Carol couldn’t help but indulge all day long, filling up her vast stomach with decadent buffet food.

As the day started to come to an end, Carol’s all day feast changed gears and she left the comfort of the buffet and headed to Lorenzo’s quarters. She knocked on the door and was greeted by her host himself.

“Oh Carol, you look ravishing. Why don’t you come in?” Lorenzo offered. Carol lumbered in her belly swaying to and fro like the rhythm of the ocean. “No mister husband tonight?” He asked.

“Oh you mean the pig, Harold. No I decided not to invite him. Last night he got drunk and hit on another woman. Oh here I go again, being to open and forward with you. I really must stop that.”

“No, no, it’s ok. I’m sorry to hear your husband is not treating you like such the queen you are. Why don’t we just forget about him for a little while. And you came here to have dinner, let us eat, yes?” Lorenzo ushered Carol out on to his port side dining retreat where a sizeable table had been set up that looked quite luxurious. Fancy table linen, cute centerpiece, relaxing ambiance. This place was quite romantic, but what stuck out to Carol were the serving dishes. There were large and seemed plentiful. Carol had been taking her indulging to the next level, throwing caution to the wind even more every day. By now she was making a total pig of herself, eating anything around her.

Lorenzo showed Carol to her seat, and he took up one next to her. He took the lid off the first dish to reveal a large pan of lasagna. Carol’s eyes grew wide as she gazed upon the gooey pasta dish. “I prepared all this food myself, so you know it’s good. I hope you like it.” Lorenzo said with a smile as he served his guest a very large piece from the pan. Carol immediately started in on her meal like she had not eaten in hours, despite the fact that she had just been eating for hours. The quantity of food her stomach could hold was becoming mind boggling.

As soon as she finished the first piece she moved on to a second one equally as large. The whole time she moaned and groaned, saying how good it was, giving her complement to Lorenzo. After the lasagna came course two which were enchiladas, and they were the biggest enchiladas Carol had ever seen, but they were also the tastiest she had ever had as well. She quickly ate one after another, enjoying them more as she went, eating sides of Spanish rice and beans with the meal. After a few enchiladas, course number three landed on her plate, pu pu platter Lorenzo called it. It was various plates of Americanized Chinese food. Teriyaki beef, chicken covered in sweet honey sauce, pork ribs covered in sweet and sour sauce, plenty of rice, even the veggies were dripping with sweet nectarous liquid.

Plate after plate of food was served and Carol easily cleared them all. Each one tasted so fabulous Carol was always excited what was to come next. Lorenzo was the best chef she had ever met. Carol ate late into the night, not even realizing how beautiful the sunset looked, and how the boat slowly quieted down as the wee hours crept in. Soon desserts were being served, and Carol learned Lorenzo was just was good with his confections as he was with entrees. Her steam started to pick up again as she started to cram puffs and eclairs between her lips.

During her meal her new dress started to her concerningly tight. Her belly was holding on to all this rich and filling food, which really put a strain on the front of her dress. Carol just ate through the pain, who cared about her silly dress.

“Miss Carol, no one has ever done me such a great honor and eaten this much of my passionate cooking before.”

“Lorenzo, it’s just all so good. This is the best meal I’ve ever had.” Carol said with a big smile, and a bloated stomach. After the onslaught of desserts, Carol decided to give her stomach a rest of a bit, and so her and Lorenzo chatted for a bit.
1522222222222222222122212111.title: Carol goes to bed without another word

choices: Carol is finally full!
Carol's appetite is too much!
Lorenzo begins to feed Carol the rest himself.
15222222222222222221222121112.content:
After an hour of chatting, Carol noticed that the clock was reading 9:30. "Oh, wow, time flies! That late already!" She giggled.

"Oh, don't tell me you're leaving already!" Lorenzo got out of his seat! "We haven't even started the second course!"

"Second course... mmmm...." Carol said, rubbing her belly. Suddenly a second course sounded very good.

"You see, my lady, I've noticed that as much as you enjoy the food here you've never been fully satisfied. So I've decided to make sure that tonight you are provided for until your appetite is truly sated." He took her hand and bowed. "Think of it as my way of thanking you for such wonderful companionship." He gave her hand a gentle kiss.

Carol giggled once more. "Oh, Lorenzo, you gentleman! Well I suppose the portions here are pretty small, as good as it is! Well I can't say no, let's see what you've got! I'll try not to make a pig out of myself!"

"Carol, you could never be associated with such a beast. Please, never feel you need to hold back from indulging! A queen should never be denied such a right." He gave her plump hand a squeeze and walked into his kitchen, returning with another cart stacked to the brim with more food. At the sight of it, Carol's mouth watered. Any pain of fullness she felt suddenly was pain of hunger.

True to Lorenzo's advice, Carol ravaged each plate, sucking the meat off a chicken wing in one gulp or shoving an entire creme brule into her stomach in 5 seconds flat, then licking the dish clean. "Oh, Lorenzo, more! So good..." She let out a wanton moan as her feat continued.

Lorenzo was in heaven as well With each bite, the lovely Carol's belly bloated up more and more. The chef hadn't thought it possible, but she looked as if she had gotten fatter through the course of the meal. Carol was definitely at least pushing on 300lbs. Every sound she made, the hungry moans, slobbery grunts and groans, and crying out for more... If she made these sounds while eating Lorenzo's loins ached to think of how she would sound in bed. It was insanity how Carol's stomach could hold a quantity of food larger than she herself was. Perhaps that's how it was converting to fat so immediately. But it was no matter. If this goddess of gluttony's world was insanity, Lorenzo was a madman who longed only for her darkness and shunned the light of common sense.

In Carol's mind, her thoughts were pretty simple. While her body's impulses kept her feasting automatically, her internal dialogue was calm and commanded none of her actions. "Lorenzo is such a darling!" She thought. "Harold never doted on me like this. I wonder if Lorenzo has a little crush on me! And would that be such a BAD thing? Oh, heavens, I'm a married woman! But this man.. he's everything a girl could dream of! I could at least humor him for a while. I'm no worse than Harold, that's for sure." By the time Carol had completed that thought, the cart was empty.

Lorenzo went into the kitchen for dessert cart number two. "Like I said, tonight is the night where all your hungers are sated." His tone was deep and sensual. "Please continue to enjoy!"
15222222222222222221222121112.title: Lorenzo has prepared even more food

choices: In the morning there is breakfast.
Carol is shocked she fell asleep in Lorenzo's cabin.
152222222222222222212221211123.content:
Carol was in a blissful state of fullness but also enjoying an eating high. She had eaten more tonight than she ever had before, but some how she kept finding the room. Lorenzo had started her on course 3 has her stomach surged forward, so full with best chef in the worlds food.

Carol just continued to chuckle, moan, and beg for more, as the hour grew late. "Oh this Lorenzo, could there be a better man in the world?" Carol thought as she continued hee feast.

Lorenzo on the other hand externalized his thought. "Miss Carol you are just radiant, you are truly glowing. Here have another plate of roasted marinaded mushrooms with your pork." As he pilled more on his growing guests plate.

Eventually Carol's fork was scraping the bottom of the plate, as she was startled out of her auto pilot eating mode. "Ooo looks like another plate down Lorenzy." Caroled cooed. Lorenzo could only flash a grin from eat to eat as he cleared her plate.

Carol just sat back, rubber her humomgus tummy, packed full of food. "Don't tell me you are full just yet, we have a few more deserts left."

"Mmm." She moaned at the thought of more of Lorenzo's confections. "I'm just getting a bit tired, but I can't turn down your baked goods, they are the best I've ever had."

"I thought all my cuisine was the best you've ever had?" Lorenzo joked as her went around the corner to grab the last tray of desserts.

"Oh you are so right." Carol sighed. "I'll never have any better than this."

"Maybe you won't ever have to..." Lorenzo said under his breath, as he was still out of sight, and Carol's eyes had drifted into the back of her head for the moment any ways.

Finally now that all the ice cream was gone, and Carol felt she had reached her stuffed limit, she allowed her body to fully relax. For her part, Kirsten could feel the blood rushing to her own cheeks and neck--though whether from awkwardness or embarrassment, she wasn't sure. Marilyn was gossiping about her! With Greg, of all people--a 28-year-old co-accountant who once spent lunches with Kirsten before Marilyn came along. And here she was, eating a salad while Marilyn and everyone in the office called her fat--literally behind her back. Well, it was typical, wasn't it?

"Kirsten?" Marilyn's voice cooed behind her, and Kirsten turned around. Even now, she had trouble not staring when she saw Marilyn. The girl was, plainly, gorgeous. Not only that, but her blonde, curlicue locks and clothing were always perfectly arranged, making her look like a classical beauty crossed with a Valley girl. She always showed plenty of skin, but somehow it never looked...cheap. It was as though Marilyn was doing a favor to people by letting them see more of her. People like that weren't supposed to work...at...at real-people jobs. Marilyn had once told her she'd "done some modeling" but it "wasn't for her." Ridiculous.

"Kirsten?" Reddening, Kirsten realized she had just been staring at Marilyn.

"What is it, Marilyn?" she said.

"How are you doing these days?" the blonde said.

"All right," she lied. "How are you?"

"Great," said the blonde, obviously surprised by the question. As if she ever wasn't "great."

"Look," said Marilyn, "I've...I don't know how much you heard of that last conversation."

"I didn't hear anything," Kirsten lied again. Her stomach grumbled in protest at her empty salad container.

"Well...some people are being kind of mean." My God, thought Kirsten, was Marilyn trying to apologize?

The blonde went on awkwardly. "I would...I'd like to try to help you...you know..."

"With?" said Kirsten, getting redder every minute.

"With...uh...with your style and stuff. I know it sounds mean, but I'm not trying to be, I swear. I'd love to have you over and do...you know...makeovers together and stuff."

"A slumber party?" Was this conversation actually happening? Kirsten almost forgot her anger. Maybe...maybe this would, at the least, be an interesting experience.

"No," laughed Marilyn, looking almost offended that Kirsten would accuse her of anything so childish. "No, I just...I've noticed that you've gotten a little...heavier...and I wanted to give you some make-up and fashion tips. Bigger people can be beautiful too, but it doesn't work to try to still look skinny."

This. Was. Amazing. The most infuriating thing of all was the Marilyn seemed seriously to believe she was doing nothing wrong. A part of Kirsten wanted to accept the girl's invitation and ask, sincerely, for her help. Another part of her wanted to simply storm out of the room after calling the little bimbo a horrible name. But with this back-handed compliment, something began to snap in Kirsten and a third, more devious, part began to manifest.

"I'd love to!" Kirsten said, cheerfully. "But I have one condition."

Millie opened the door and walked into the small basement studio. It was simple, with fluorescent lighting brightening up gray walls with mirrors and wooden bars on them, and a sturdy wood floor. She had already dressed for the class, in a stretchy leotard which clung to her almost non-existent curves and muscular but thin arms. About 8 women were already gathered around the room, men and women stretching out and talking. There was no sign of the teacher.

Millie looked around at her classmates, curiously. A handful of them were heavy, including a brunette woman who looked to be a few years older than Millie, with her wide ass bulging from her pants, but most were thin. A few others stood out, including a thin girl leaning on the wall and a woman who definitely looked old enough to he her mother.

1522222222222222222222222112.content:
Jackie was standing in the corner slightly regretting having joined. She knew what the class entailed and was a bit worried about getting fat. She was tall, and slightly curvy but still rail thin, and attractive in a forbidding way with a vaguely goth look despite her standard leotard. She saw the similarly thin and attractive Millie walk in and began to wonder why someone like her would want to get fat. She approached her and said “Hi I’m Jackie, and it’s nice to meet you.”

“Oh..” Millie shyly mumbled. “Hi, I’m Millie. It’s nice to meet you. I was going to ask if this was your first time Fat Dancing, but um, clearly, um. Sorry, I’m kind of nervous!”

“Yeah... me too. I’m starting to wonder if I’m going to regret this. I don’t really know how it even works. I guess we’ll just have to figure it out together, though,” she tried to comfort her.

“Alright, class, listen up!” A Latina woman who was massive, weighing over 300 pounds, waddled in. She was dressed in the same outfit as the rest of them, with her leotard clinging to her massive pear shaped figure. “My name is Daria and I am going to be your teacher at Fat Dancing. You all know the studio rules! No phones, no gum, etc. Now, as this is a beginner’s class, I am here to instruct you on how you’re going to adjust to your fat bodies as well as the movements! I’ll warn you, this is undeniably a sexual dance. It has more in common with pole dance than ballet. You will be twerking, you will be thrusting, and you will be jiggling.” She shook her hips back and forth to emphasize this. “You will be trained to show off your bodies and be sexy doing so. Anyone who is uncomfortable can leave now.”

“Oh dear!” Millie squeaked. “Well, this ought to be interesting,” Jackie commented quietly, staring at Daria’s large stomach for an amount of time that it made her uncomfortable. She thought that maybe he wouldn’t be that bad. It seemed like it would be fun and Millie seemed nice. “Exactly how do we get fat for this?” she questioned. “Is there a specific method you use or do we just sort of have to eat a lot?” “Great question!,” said Daria “In that case over there are 9 vials of a weight gain shake. You will partner up, and then you will drink one which will cause you to gain twenty pounds. You will drink another one every other week until you are at least 150 pounds heavier than you are today. In the meantime, I expect weight training to maintain that body, both your strength for movement and your body fat. Then, we will perform! Partner up!”
